Marvel Pinball combines the greatest Super Heroes of all time with the definitive videogame pinball experience of all time. Use your pinball wizardry to help the legendary Marvel Universe heroes rid the pinball landscape of notorious Super Villains in an epic combination of superhuman might, immersive gameplay, and unprecedented table visuals! Marvel Pinball supports a wide variety of Android powered tablets! Marvel Pinball now supports Android TV! The initial Marvel Pinball download comes with Marvel's The Avengers table. Other Marvel Pinball tables can be purchased as in-app purchases. **For players already enjoying Marvel Pinball tables in Zen Pinball, we want to give you a heads up that there is no way for us to transfer purchases or make tables available in both apps. Thanks for your support!** Tables include Spider-Man, Wolverine, Iron Man, Blade, Ghost Rider, Moon Knight, Thor, X-Men, Fantastic Four, Captain America, World War Hulk, The Infinity Gauntlet, Fear Itself and Civil War. Marvel Pinball continues to be one of the highest rated Metacritic rated games of all time! What the press have to say: In a sense Marvel Pinball is the best mix of comic books and retro and modern gaming. Zen Studios goes the extra mile with plenty of options and multiplayer experiences for users to enjoy. - IGN Marvel Pinball is a must-have for pinball fans. Zen has proven time and again that they are the best at what they do, and what they do best is pinball. - The Adrenaline Vault Naturally, the table artwork is gorgeous, doing the Marvel license proud, and the animated characters that leap around the playfields always enhance the look. - OXM These tables are pretty friggin' cool. - G4TV Marvel Pinball remains one of the best downloadable games on any system. - Game Rant Download Marvel Pinball now!
release_text: Marvel's Ant-Man Table is now available as an in-app purchase!

description: Video Player - Audio Player, the smoothest video player for android devices. Video Player - Audio Player is a powerful, easy-to-use video player. It is currently the smoothest video player on android market. Its intelligent adaptive algorithm and multi-core decoding algorithm make it more quickly and easily for you to enjoy smoother and better quality videos. It comprehensively supports all popular video and audio playback formats, including AVI, 3GP, M4V, MOV, MP4, WMV, RMVB, MKV, TS, MPG, FLV , etc. It uses hardware decoding, faster and smoother. It also supports gestures to easily adjust the screen brightness and video volume. It can automatically detect video and audio in the phone memory and SD Card, allowing you to quickly locate and play the video. As a media player, Video Player - Audio Player can not only play high-definition videos, movies and flash files, but also play music. So Video Player for Android can be used as a music player as well. Video Player - Audio Player is the essential software for android mobile phone. It is the best way to enjoy your movies! Characteristics: 1 automatically identifies all video and audio files 2 supports all video and audio playback formats 3 supports multiple subtitle formats, automatic synchronization 4 using hardware decoding, take advantage of hardware acceleration 5 supports gestures to adjust the brightness and volume 6 small memory, simple operation, smooth playback
release_text: 1.support online media playing 2.support more formats of videos and audios 3.support multi external sdcard 4.support continuous play 5.support rename, delete media files

description: Since many rom of Android have not full set of language system ,sometimes it is very hard to set the language you want in your phone.Or if the custom locale function in menu don't support your language,you can try this application ! With ENABLE LANGUAGE application ,it is very easy to change the system language and applications. Three steps I will move from a system in French to English, without rebooting the system. 1. Open the Enable language App . 2. Search the desired language . 3. Select your language ,and now the language change is made without rebooting your phone. imporant :Default language feature supports all Android devices (In ANDROID 4.2+ , Only system app can get CHANGE_CONFIGURATION permission.(Changed by Google)).

This application will allow you to quickly and easily verify your menstruation phase and find out your fertility throughout the whole year! It will calculate your next menstrual cycle days. You will be able to find out your safe sex and high risk days, or good chance for pregnancy. Calendar of menstruation and fertility will become your closest friend, that will always stay with you. It is very easy to use and has a very intuitive user interface. All you need to do is enter your individual duration of menstrual cycle, pick the first day of your last menstruation and it is done!
release_text: Support for tablets Added translations for numerous languages

description: Undead vs Plants is a new cool ricochet shooter game free to download. Not all undead are stupid undeads, this undead smasher uses ricochet kills to end with nasty plants! The rules for this free undead game are simple – aim and fire and hope the bullets will go your way! The bullets bounce off everywhere, try using as less as possible to finish with the bloody monster plants in this extremely fun arcade shooting game! This is a real plants war against undeads – if you are stupid, plants will end you! You guys should prove you aren't stupid undeads, and be the smartest undead with a good strategy that can kill all the plants and save your ammo! This bullet hell game is easy-to-handle but hard to master ! This addicting game full with plants on a undead farm has 150 levels, all of which are special in their own way, and on every one of them, you can win 1, 2 or 3 stars. Try solving the puzzle of monster plants and passing all the levels with max number of stars! But beware, ammo is limited. You will need to be cagey and clever in order to be successful in this physics simulation game. Believe us, it's a tricky puzzle game, and every time you involve in solving the level, you will be brain training! This shoot 'em up immerses you in the crazy undead versus plants world where your goal is to shoot those bloody monsters plants! Ricochet kills is the only thing that can destroy these ragdoll plants – aim the right angle, and use your bullets wisely. Using different helps and upgrades will be very helpful in your adventure! This shooter game offers: Smack Attack when your undead gets stuck on any level, Ammo Revival when you shoot all of the bullets and bloody monster plants are still alive; Shoot and travel through different plants and undeads' worlds – from blurry caves to sunny beaches and wild jungles. If you love physics game and are in the mood for some serious gun shooting fun then this addicting game of ricochet is great for you. This HD fun game of undead versus plants will offer an intense experience for hardcore gamers, yet remaining accessible to new casual gamers. Don't be stupid – come & play Undead vs Plants now for a great experience! ** Undead vs Plants offers tablet optimized UI and gameplay. Download and play this fun undead game on any Android phone and tablet and enjoy HD graphics and sounds. This free game is intellectual property of PeakselGames – copyright 2015
release_text: MINOR BUGS FIXED - Our team is working permanently to improve your experience.

description: A FREE turn based STRATEGY game in the age of empires and knights, with over 200 MAPS and more than 80 UNIT TYPES! Campaigns, random games and MULTIPLAYER games are waiting for you! Join the FORUM to suggest changes/unit types for the game! We have votes monthly on new unit types! FORUM opened for the game! (check it in the game or here: http://www.androidutils.com/forum/) ! The game is a Retro like "8-bit" game, so it is not pretty, no fancy animations, this is PURE GAMEPLAY ORIENTED turn based strategy. Includes - 170 Campaign maps (historical ones too! eg: Battle of Troy and so on) - 40 random maps - more than 80 unit types - more than 25 technologies to invent - multiplayer game (with option to coop against AI-s) - rewarding systems: collecting stars, collecting gems for unlocking new unit/building types UNIT REQUESTS: there are many requests for new units and unique units (eg. historical heroes), I am pretty open to this since it is pretty easy to setup a new unit. Please join the forum and put there the idea and i will make it! If u install it - be kind with the rating, since this app is in the middle of growing - feel free to send me any suggestions on any part of the game (gameplay, units, unit-properties, new unit suggestions, graphics) - If u would like to take part in creating this game (eg. graphics, translation, ideas) send me an email. What to do: 1. Create a game (select map, set colors, players, teams) 1.1. OR start a Campaign 1.2 OR play MULTIPLAYER 2. play it 5. send me suggestions. Have fun!
release_text: New FAN map for the 4th of July! Information: The Fantasy version is under development, so the game engine is changing, if you face any unexpected change on AOS / or a new problem please inform me! (see game forum to follow the Fantasy version or to try it)

description: Fyzika Elektro zobrazí off-line (bez nutnosti mít připojení k internetu) data z české Wikipedie. Fyzika Elektro pracuje i bez připojení k internetu a obsahuje tyto témata, nebo moduly: "Ampér", "Cívka", "Elektromagnetismus", "Energie", "Frekvence", "Indukce", "Indukčnost", "Induktance", "Kapacita", "Kapacitance", "Kondenzátor", "Napětí", "Odpor", "Ohm", "Práce", "Proud", "Reaktance", "Volt", "Výkon", "Dictionary", "Support Wikipedia" (můžete vytvořit článek, nebo finančně podpořit projekt Wikipedie) Fyzika Electronics displayed off-line (without an Internet connection) data from the Czech Wikipedia. Fyzika Electric works without internet and includes the following topics or modules: "Amp" "Coil" "Electromagnetism" "Energy" "Frequency", "Induction" "Inductance" "Inductance" "Capacity" "Capacitance" "Capacitor" "Voltage" "Resistance" "Ohm" "Work" "Proud" "Reactance" "Volt" "Performance" "Dictionary", "Support Wikipedia" (you can create an article, or financially support the project Wikipedia)

description: Eco Bicycle – Cycling Tracker is a GPS tracker that tracks the most important aspects of your bike ride, including total time, distance, total change in altitude, current speed, maximum speed, and average speed. Unlike other GPS Trackers, Eco Bicycle – Cycling Tracker tracks your bike ride in a battery friendly way, and gives you control to choose between accuracy and battery life. Have a long bike race planned? You’ll want to set the app to maximum battery life. Going on a pedal around the block? Set the app to full accuracy. Something in between? Pick somewhere in the middle! All cyclers love the following features that make Eco Bicycle – Cycling Tracker a quality free app: - It is possible to choose between accuracy and longer battery life. - We do not use unnecessary functions in order to save a maximum of battery life. - We always have a great level of accuracy as our main target. - Our cycling app is of universal use – no matter if you’re in a race for USA Cycling or USCF, or just peddling around the block. - Our app stores your history, so if you’re training for a USA Cycling race, you can track your progress over time. Eco Bicycle – Cycling Tracker is simple to use. Upon launching the app, the Eco Bicycle is ready to go as soon as the GPS icon changes to green. The GPS search begins after pressing the Play button, to save a maximum of battery life. Stopping for a break? Press the pause button. All done for the day, press the stop button and your cycling session will be logged in the Track History log. Eco Bicycle – Cycling Tracker also tracks these aspects of your biking: TOTAL TIME: The total time of your biking. DISTANCE: How far you biked. ALTITUDE: Changes in your elevation. If you go up a 10 meter hill and back down a 10 meter hill, the app notes that you traversed 20 meters of elevation. CURRENT SPEED: How fast you’re biking. MAXIMUM SPEED: The fastest speed you achieved during your biking. AVERAGE SPEED: The average speed over the course of your biking. The Eco Bicycle – Cycling Tracker Menu allows you to change the following settings: SETTING: Accuracy versus Battery Life and switch between metric and non metric unit system TRACK HISTORY: Load stats from each of your previous bike rides. Elements like average speed are great for comparing over time, as they’ll show you how much you are improving as a cyclist! Download our cycling app now and save a lot of battery life during your bike ride. This app is perfect for those training for various races for USA Cycling, USCF, or US Pro. For questions or comments please send us a message. Check out our other eco apps: Eco Runner: Run Tracker ecoSkitracker - Skiing Tracker Keywords : bike, biking, biker, cycling, bicycle, bicycling, echelon, panniers, pedal, USA Cycling, USCF, USPRO, velodrome, gps tracker, cycling tracker, bike tracker
release_text: - We implemented non metric units especially for US and UK user - There is also a new option in the menu for switching between metric and non metric units - We made a lot of improvements in the code - We are working on more great stuff :) For questions and improvements please contact us: dmapps7@gmail.com or visit our site: dmapps7.de

description: Get up-to-date schedules and trip plans for Berlin's public transport system. It's simple and intuitive, pick your departure and arrival stations and get a list of the next best connections to your destination. Contents: - information on connecting service - display of departures - purchase of mobile tickets - map with nearby stops, stations and car2go rentals - public transport network maps - display stations nearby with the support of Augmented Reality BVG FahrInfo Plus Berlin is the journey planner and mobile ticket shop published by the Berliner Verkehrsbetriebe (BVG) for the Transportation Association Berlin-Brandenburg (VBB) in the tariff zones Berlin AB, BC and ABC. The app includes all means of transport within the Transportation Association Berlin-Brandenburg (VBB), including Underground and S-Bahn, Tram, Bus and Ferry as well as regional trains. Setting the departure and destination will show the next journeys to your destination and appropriate mobile tickets ready for purchase. For Berlin, tariff areas are defined and divided into tariff zone A, B, and C. Tariff zone A covers Berlin's inner city up to and including the urban rail ring. Tariff zone B covers the area outside the urban rail ring up to the city boundary. Whereas tariff zone C includes Greater Berlin (area approx. 15 km around the State of Berlin), including the City of Potsdam. Mobile tickets are available for the tariff zones AB, BC and ABC. BVG FahrInfo Plus Berlin contains the following features: * Purchase of mobile tickets, payable by credit card or direct debit for the tariff zones Berlin AB, BC and ABC. - Short-trip ticket (Kurzstrecke) (reduced and bicycle fare are also available) - Single ticket (Einzelfahrausweis) (reduced and bicycle fare are also available) - Extension ticket (Anschlussfahrausweis) - Day ticket (Tageskarte) (reduced and bicycle fare are also available) - Small group day ticket (Kleingruppen-Tageskarte) (for up to 5 people) - Berlin WelcomeCard (for 48 hours, 72 hours, Museum Island and 5 days) - Berlin CityTourCard (for 48 hours, 72 hours and 5 days) * Journey planner * Display of departures * Additional settings - Save favorite journeys - Alerts on upcoming departures or connections - Choose a contact as the destination of your journey (optional) * Map of surrounding stops and stations including the locations of available car2go carsharing vehicles * Scalable network maps (offline) You need a connection to the internet to use features like the journey planner, departure board and mobile ticket shop. You can access a purchased and downloaded ticket at any time without connection to the internet.
release_text: + New layout / design with improved usability + Rail numbers + Via location + New detailed maps of the railway network + Select a location from the map for routing + Timetable can be displayed as horizontal or vertical bars and as routes on the map + Details for your trip and intermediate stops + Live data (VVB and BVG) for departures and for routing + and much more ...

description: Listen to hardcoreradio.nl whole the day with Hardcore Radio. Angerfist, Outblast, Randy, Virus Factory, Endymion, Nosferatu, Bass-D or Serial Killaz.

We've given DB Navigator a totally new look. Your personal travel planner now has the following great features. New - Your travel planner. All the details of your journey are available at a single glance, such as timely notification of your upcoming train transfers, connections, station information, alternative routes and delay notices. New - Your favourites. It's now so easy to travel to your favourite getaways. Just save the destinations that you love to visit, along with connections and train times. Even better - Faster information in the event of disruptions. DB Navigator has a direct link to Live Auskunft in its menu and factors in train cancellations and real-time data when searching for connections. New - Map. You can see not only your exact location, but also all nearby stops (including local public transport like bus und subway), station information, and even carsharing Flinkster and Call a Bike hiring points for ease of planning. New - Buy regional tickets via the app. DB Navigator's menu now includes a link to our ever popular regional travel offers: Länder-Tickets, the Schönes-Wochenende-Ticket and the Quer-Durchs-Land-Ticket. All for instant mobile reservation! New - Super-fast ticket access. You can now access your ticket straight from the app's home page on the day of travel. Save money while you travel. The saver fare finder shows you the cheapest ticket for the route you want to take. Delay alarm. Set up a delay alarm before you travel and you'll be kept up to date with the latest developments via e-mail or push notifications. Ideal for commuters: select duration and days as you require. Have fun exploring these great new features, and enjoy your trip. We'd love to hear from you. Simply use the in-app contact function to provide us with your feedback.
release_text: - New design - "My journey": the central hub for your travel plans - Store favourites plus time-related information - Book regional tickets via your smartphone - One-step access to your current ticket - Save travel plans offline - Excellent map with station information

description: Alle Züge auf einen Blick: Mit dem DB Zugradar Verfolgen Sie die Züge des DB Nah- und Fernverkehrs live im DB Zugradar und grenzen Sie durch den Filter die Darstellung der Verkehrsmittel (Fernverkehr (ICE und IC/EC), Nahverkehr) und Bahnhöfe ein. Der DB Zugradar stellt auf einer dynamischen Karte das gesamte Streckennetz der Deutschen Bahn dar. Mit dem DB Zugradar können Sie das aktuelle Betriebsgeschehen aller DB-Züge auf einen Blick verfolgen. Damit wird Ihnen beispielsweise die aktuelle Situation einer ausgewählten Zugfahrt schnell und einfach visualisiert und die Pünktlichkeitslage in Echtzeit angezeigt. Wichtige Hinweise zur Darstellung: Die Zugpositionen werden auf Basis von Prognosen berechnet. Es werden keine Positionsdaten verwendet (GPS). Dies kann zu kleineren Unschärfen in der Darstellung auf der Karte führen. All supplied at a glance: The DB Zugradar Trace the course of the DB local and long distance traffic in the live DB Zugradar and borders through the filter, the representation of transport (long-distance transport (ICE and IC / EC), local transport) and Stations. The DB Zugradar presents on a dynamic map of the entire route network of the Deutsche Bahn dar. With the DB Zugradar you will find markings follow the current operating events of all DB-fed at a glance. To make the example, the current situation of a ausgewählten schedule quickly visualized and the Pünktlichkeitslage in real time. Important notes on presentation: The slide positions are calculated on the basis of forecasts. No position data used (GPS). This can lead to smaller blurred in the representation on the map.

Die S-Bahn App. Verbindet alles, was Sie wissen müssen. Die S-Bahn-App vereint eine komfortable Fahrplanauskunft (inkl. Echtzeitdaten, Fußwegrouting, Stadtplan) mit den wichtigsten S-Bahn-Informationen (Fahrplanänderungen, aktuelle Betriebsstörungen, Bahnhofsinfos) und eine Vielzahl von nützlichen Kontakt- oder Telefondaten für unterwegs (bis hin zur WC-Suche). Inhalte: +++ Fahrplanauskunft +++ - Verbindungsauskunft inkl. von Haustür zu Haustür - Fußwegsuche mit Darstellung in Umgebungskarte - Echtzeit-Abfahrtszeiten (inkl. Verspätungen) und Alternativrouten - Umgebungskarte mit Haltestellen und Abfahrtszeiten - Interaktives Liniennetz - Standortbestimmung - Wegeweisung via Augmented Reality +++ S-Bahn-Inhalte +++ - Fahrplanänderungen und aktuelle Betriebsstörungen inkl. Twittermeldungen - Bahnhofsinfos inkl. P+R, WC, Verkaufsstellen u.v.m. - Verfügbarkeit von Aufzügen und Fahrtreppen - Ticketinformationen inkl. Mitnahmeregelungen - Aktuelle Informationen rund um die S-Bahn +++ Ausflugstipps +++ - Exklusive mehrstündige Ausflugstouren von und zu S-Bahnhöfen - Rabattangebote für S-Bahn-Stammkunden +++ Hilfen für Unterwegs +++ - Notruf-/Hotline-Nummern mit Direktwahl - Hilfe bei Wertsachenverlust, Automatenstörung, Fahrscheinkontrolle u.v.m. - WC-Suche Die App benötigt folgende Berechtigungen: Standort: - Verbindungssuche inkl. Fußwegrouting ab der eigenen Position - Anzeige richtigen Stadtplanteils inkl. Anzeige der eigenen Position - Anzeige der Haltestellen in der Nähe, inkl. Entfernung und Richtung - Anzeige der eigenen Position im Stadtplan (Bahnhöfe, Ausflugtipps) - Sortierung der Bahnhöfe nach Entfernung - Sortierung der Bahnhöfe mit Verkaufsstellen nach Entfernung - Sortierung der Bahnhöfe mit WCs nach Entfernung Kalenderzugriff: - Verbindungsinformationen in den Kalender zu speichern Kontaktdaten/Adressbuch: - Statt Haltestelle/Standort kann der Kontakt in die Verbindungssuche eingegeben werden. Kamera - Der Zugriff auf die Kamera wird für die Augmented Reality-Funktion benötigt. In dieser Funktion, bei Standort über das Kamerasymbol zu erreichen, werden die Haltestellen der Umgebung live in das Kamerabild eingeblendet. The S-Bahn app. Combines everything you need to know. The S-Bahn app combines a convenient timetable (incl. Real-time data, footpath routing, map) with the main S-Bahn-information (schedule changes, current malfunctions, station information) and a variety of useful contact or telephone data on the go (up to WC-search). Content: +++ +++ Fahrplanauskunft - Connection information including door-to-door. - Walk with representation in Search Map - Real-time departure times (incl. Delays) and alternative routes - Map, stops and departure times - Interactive line network - Placement Test - Way transfer via Augmented Reality +++ S-Bahn content +++ - Schedule changes and current malfunctions including Twitter messages. - Station info including many more P + R, WC, outlets. - Availability of elevators and escalators - Ticket information including driving regulations. - Current information about the S-Bahn +++ +++ Excursions - Exclusive more hour excursion tours to and from train stations - Discount rates for S-Bahn regulars +++ +++ Aids for the Road - Emergency / hotline numbers with direct dial - Help with valuable loss, machine failure, ticket inspections etc. - WC-Search The app requires the following permissions: Location: -. Connection Search incl footpath routing from one's own position -. Display proper city plan including display part of its own position - Display of bus stops nearby, including distance and direction. - Indication of one's position in the map (railway stations, excursions) - Sorting the stations by distance - Sorting of stations with outlets by distance - Sorting of stations with toilets by distance Calendar access: - To store connection information in the calendar Contact / Address: - Instead of stop / location can be entered in the contact the connection search. Camera - The access to the camera is needed for the Augmented Reality feature. In this capacity, to achieve at location on the camera icon, which stops around are displayed live in the camera image.
release_text: - Neues Design für Routenplaner, Abfahrtszeiten und Stadtplan - Einfacherer Zugriff auf letzte Verbindungen und Stationen - Verbesserung der Geschwindigkeit

description: Build a bridge with the given amount of materials to let the train safely cross the valley.

description: Emulator for the popular 80's home computer C64. Can be controller via touchscreen, trackball, keyboard and/or external USB/bluetooth controller. Offers an on-screen keyboard for text input. Comes with some Public Domain games, f.e. Elite, Kickstart oder Attack of the Mutant Camels, ready to play! Other games can be added to the SD card and played from there. The emulator is not the fastest, so that a fast CPU is recommended for running it smoothly. The permission to write to SD card is required in order to be able to save changes to .d64 files.

A jump & run game mixing elements of classic games like Super Mario World with elements from recent mobile games like Flappy Bird. Guide Jeremy with his jetpack through the tunnels of his underground gardens, where he can gather flowers for his beloved girl. Keep your finger on the screen to gain height with the jetpack, lift it from the screen to lose height, always avoiding collisions with the tunnel walls. The game has 50 levels of increasing difficulty. It uses global leaderboards where you can compare your highscore to that of other players, and allows challenge games (requires Android 2.3 or higher). In addition to the touchscreen controls the game can also be controlled external Bluetooth/USB controllers, trackball or keyboard. The game is MOGA Enhanced and also runs on the Nvidia Shield. Integrated with Immersion MOTIV Haptic Effects. Ad-supported version. App permissions required for ad retrieval. Ads can be disabled via an in-app purchase.

A set of utilities for the Rolemaster (TM) Fantasy Roleplaying game. Currently implemented are: - a simple dice roller: rolls a d10, d100, d1000 and d100-openended on the press of a button - treasure generation: Enter the monster's treasure code(s) and with one button press the program rolls what loot the monster leaves. It uses the RMSS/RMFRP rules for treasure generation from Treasure Companion. Not all tables are yet coded into the program, but it should usually do more than 90% of the dice rolling involved and leave only small parts to the GM. The app displays ads and thus requires some permissions. If you don't like apps with ads, just don't download it. If you like the app, please rate it. If you don't like it, please tell me where I can improve it.

Reversi Multiplayer – the world famous Reversi game is now available as multiplayer game! Free download and easy to play ! +++ Features +++ * Reversi Single player mode * Reversi 2 player mode, to play against some one else on the same Android device * Reversi Multiplayer Mode, to play against some one else any where on the world Reversi is also known as Othello

podKatcher is an Android app to easily find and play downloadable media offerings distributed in form of podcasts. Find millions of free downloads: mp3s and videos in form of podcasts. Hassle free downloads without rss feeds or URLs. Just start this free app and start downloading. Use this free podcast downloader to subscribe to podcasts on your Android device. It´s simple, good looking and free. No need to copy and paste urls of rss feeds. You can follow podcasts by clicking a star or using a gesture. Features of this podcatcher + download shows for offline usage or listen/watch with on demand streaming + full shownotes for all shows including HTML and images + podcast charts with podcasts in your language + podcast search in 180,000+ podcasts (channels) + browse podcasts by category (slider bar) + one click subscriptions + subscribe to podcast feed by url + podcast subscription sync across devices and platforms + OPML export from within the podcast app + easy sharing including Google Plus support + fast login with Google and Facebook + swiping and gestures support + seamless integration with Google Play Music or your favorite media player (like VLC or MX Player) + up to 50.000 new shows every day + up to 250 new podcasts every day + video thumbnails and embedded cover art Best podcast downloader This Podcatcher Android App is carefully tested on popular devices but due to the nature of Android some manufacture specific changes might cause trouble. Please report problems to help us make the best podcast downloader on the market! Podcast collections in your language Download free audiobooks from Librivox, podcasts from BBC, CNN, ABC radio and thousands other radio stations from the U.S. and around the world (Europe incl. U.K., Italy, Spain, Asia incl. Japan, China, Korea, South America incl. Chile, Brazil, Argentina) onto your device. We feature podcasts not only in English or German but also Spanish, Italian, French Japanese, Chinese, Korean and most other languages. Free Android podcatcher podKatcher is the official podcast software of www.podcast.name and podcast.de It´s free as in beer! So download this podcast app for Android now!
release_text: Version 1.0.1.3 - Feed subscriptions by url Previous versions - Saves download incl. full url as filename - Search history (with clear functionality) - Shows download size and play length - Shows logo fullscreen on click - Login with Facebook - Async loading of video thumbs - Details for downloads incl. thumbs - Full tablet support - Browse podcasts by categories - Google Plus Login - Video thumbnails - Shows duration for downloaded files - Visualizes played downloads - OPML export

description: GeOrg is an application for paperless geocaching Features: * Import Geocache-GPX-Files * List, view and sort caches * View caches on a google and OSM-maps * Navigate with the built-in compass or the map *Currently portrait-mode only* Docs: http://bit.ly/georgdox Legal: http://bit.ly/georgtou
release_text: * Spoilers are now clickable and will open in 3rd-party tools for zooming and image-manipulation. * Support for new waypoint-types "physical/virtual stage". Future new waypoint-types can be imported even GeOrg doesn't recognize the type. * Fixed "Navigation with Google Navigation". Downside: Target name is not displayed within Google Navigation anymore. * Support for Giga Event and Groundspeak Block Party waypoint types. * A few more bugfixes. Read more at http://android.ranitos.de/changelog/

description: Das bietet die kostenlose Android-App von wetter.de: - 15 Tage Vorhersage für Deutschland - Temperatur & gefühlte Temperatur - Regenmenge & -wahrscheinlichkeit - Sonnenauf- & -untergang, Sonnenstunden - Windstärke & -richtung - Unwetterwarnungen Das aktuelle Wetter für Ihren Standort Für alle, die es genauer wissen wollen, bietet die App von wetter.de nicht nur Temperatur und Regenwahrscheinlichkeit, sondern auch genaue Angaben zum Zeitpunkt des Sonnenauf- und Sonnenuntergangs sowie zur Anzahl der Sonnenstunden pro Tag. Auch für Allergiker haben wir das passende Wetter: Der Pollenflug gibt an, wie stark Sie am jeweiligen Tag betroffen sind. Unwetterwarnungen für jeden Ort in Deutschland Leider ist das Wetter in Deutschland nicht immer sommerlich. Wolken, Regen und Gewitter stehen oft auf der Tagesordnung. Dabei zeigt unsere Wetter-App, wo mit Unwetter oder Starkregen zu rechnen ist. Reisewetter für Urlauber Lassen Sie sich das Urlaubswetter für Ihren nächsten Ferienort schon vorab anzeigen und packen Sie Ihren Koffer passend nach der Wettervorhersage und prognostizierten Temperaturen. Ihre liebsten Orte in der Favoritenliste Speichern Sie zum Beispiel Wohn- und Arbeitsort oder Ihren nächsten Ferienort in der Wetter-App. Durch Hin- und Herwischen wechseln Sie zwischen Ihren Favoriten ganz einfach und können jederzeit neue hinzufügen oder alte löschen. Zusätzlich: interessante und kurzweilige Videos rund um das Thema Wetter. Haben Sie Feedback zur App? Wir freuen uns auf Ihre E-Mail an appstore@rtl.de . Nutzen Sie auch unser umfangreiches Angebot auf www.wetter.de! Hinweise zu den Berechtigungen: Bei der Installation der wetter.de-App geben Sie uns Zugriff auf verschiedene Bereiche Ihres Smartphones. Gerne möchten wir Ihnen kurz erläutern, wofür diese Daten benötigt werden. - Standort: Ermittlung Ihres Standortes für passende Wettervorhersagen - Fotos/ Medien / Dateien: Konfiguration und Wetterdaten auf dem Gerät speichern und vom Gerät lesen - WLAN-Verbindungsinformationen: Daten aus dem Internet laden - Geräte-ID & Anrufinformationen: Display-Vermarktung - Sonstige (Zugriff auf alle Netzwerke, Netzwerkverbindungen abrufen): Daten aus dem Internet laden This provides the free Android app of wetter.de: - 15 Days forecast for Germany - Temperature & wind chill temperature - Rainfall and verisimilitude - Sunrise & Sunset Sun hours - Wind strength and direction - Severe weather warnings The current weather for your location For those who want to know more, the app offers from wetter.de not only temperature and chance of rain, but also precise information at the time of sunrise and sunset, as well as to the number of hours of sunshine per day. Even for people with allergies we have the right weather: The pollen indicates how strong you are concerned on that day. Severe weather warnings for any location in Germany Unfortunately, the weather in Germany is not always summer. Clouds, rain and thunderstorms are often on the agenda. It shows our weather app, which can be expected storm or heavy rainfall. Travel forecasts for tourists Let the holiday weather for your next holiday show in advance and keep your bags suitable for the weather forecast and forecasted temperatures. Your favorite places in the Favorites list Save for example live and work, or on your next holiday in the Weather app. By way Herwischen switch easily between your favorite and can always add new or delete old ones. In addition: interesting and entertaining videos on the subject of weather. Have feedback about the app? We look forward to your e-mail to appstore@rtl.de . Take advantage of our extensive range on www.wetter.de!   Notes on permissions: When you install the App wetter.de give us access to different areas of your smartphone. We would like to explain to you briefly what these data are needed. - Location: determine your GPS location for matching weather forecasts - Photos / media / files: Save configuration and weather information on your device and read from the device Load data from the Internet wireless connection information - - Device ID & Call Information: Display marketing - Other (to access all networks, network connections retrieve): load data from the Internet

Punktgenaue Daten und Prognosen für jeden Ort in Deutschland, inklusive vielen nützlichen Spezialwetterbereichen.“ „Wetter DE – eine der besten Apps in Kategorie Wetter für Deutschland!!!“ Möchtest Du nur einen kurzen Überblick über das aktuelle Wetter, wissen – ob es bei Deiner Grillparty heute Abend trocken bleibt, eine Prognose für die nächsten Tage - oder lieber doch ausgiebige Informationen über das Biowetter oder Dein nächstes Reiseziel? Precise data and forecasts for any location in Germany, including many useful special weather areas. " "Weather DE - one of the best apps in the category Weather for Germany!" Do you want only a brief overview of the current weather, you know - if it remains at your BBQ party tonight dry, a forecast for the next few days - or better yet extensive information about the bioweather or your next destination? MORE: Are you interested in the bathing weather or are you planning a hike, you can go golfing or skiing - and want to know how the weather will be like? Then you are always well informed and immediately right into the special areas of our weather app.   FEATURES: • Pinpoint Weather forecasts for your current location (GPS locator) • Current weather conditions and forecasts for any location in Germany • Detailed forecasts for today and tomorrow day (morning, afternoon, evening, night) • 6-day forecast: pinpoint accuracy for any location in Germany • Clear displays with weather conditions, temperature, wind speed, wind direction • Convenient search function by place name or postcode input • Local Severe weather warnings for hail, ice, storm, tempest, etc. • Bathing water temperatures and weather forecasts • ski weather and forecasts for all ski areas in Germany and Austria • Sailing and windsurfing weather with wind directions and wind speeds • Mountain weather - for every mountain in Germany and Austria • Football Weather - for the first stages of National league • Golf Weather - for every golf course in Germany • Current satellite image, precipitation, wind and temperature forecast Movies • International Weather with clear global search • Desired save locations as favorites "Be with the weather app Germany always top-informed and invite them equally totally free to your mobile phone". Calendar Droid is a calendar application that works with all the calendars on your device (such as Google Calendar, Exchange, Facebook, Birthdays, etc.) The philosophy behind this app is a calendar that is easy to use, clean, intuitive, and highly customizable. This is the paid version of Calendar Droid. There is a free version that will remain free and without ads. Please consider supporting the development by buying this. FEATURES ONLY IN PAID VERSION: • Advanced recurrence/repeating rules like bi-weekly (choose 'Weekly' to show more options), etc. • Copy/paste of events • Preview on color settings • (**Android 3+ only**) Agenda widget (**Android 3+ only**) • Select which calendars to show • Change default reminder time FEATURES: • Month View / Week View / Day View / Agenda View / Weeks View • View events • Add/edit events • Settings to customize (many options for customization) • Action Bar on all versions of Android FUTURE FEATURES IN PAID VERSION ONLY: **** THESE ARE NOT IN THE VERSION YET! • Localization (more languages) • Change calendar colors • Search events • Color themes • More widgets Remember: You have to synchronize the calendars to your device for them to show up. PERMISSIONS: • READ CONTACT DATA If you have any guests (or attendees) on an event and you have that person in your contacts the app will read information from that contact and show it when viewing an event. The contact picture will show up and then clicked will take you to the default "contact clicked" scenario. I know this permission looks bad together with internet access but I do not store nor send any contact info. Only contacts that are guests to viewed events are read by the program. • READ CALENDAR EVENTS This should be obvious. Read the description again and see if you can spot what this is used for ;) • ADD OR MODIFY CALENDAR EVENTS AND SEND EMAIL TO GUESTS Again, this should be obvious. Calendar Droid needs to change your calendar events. Sending emails to guests is done when putting email addresses in the "guest" box when creating an event. • WAKE LOCK Used by the widget. This actually saves battery since the widget does not wake up the phone when it has the screen off. The wake lock is only used to keep the phone alive during updates. The update interval is controller by "alarms". • READ SYNC SETTINGS Use to read which calendars that are synchronized to the device. • GET ACCOUNTS Used to find accounts with calendars so they can be selected to be synchronized. • MANAGE ACCOUNTS Used to manage the synchronize settings for calendars under a account.
release_text: 1.6.6 - Bug fix release • Fix: The widget is now updating events and header • Fix: Rare start-up crash • Fix: Agenda view updating when new events are created • Fix: Events being on the wrong times when deleting a really early event • Fix: The add button will now select a more appropiate time if no time is selected manually

description: *** NEW : Glass Widgets 3.0 is now in BETA. The new version supports widget resizing and scrolling, and a new WYSIWYG settings screen. It rolls most of the features of Glass Widgets ICS into the 'classic' Glass Widgets edition, and the ICS edition will be deprecated once the new version leaves the BETA phase. The BETA requires Android 4.2.2 or newer. Join up at https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/103885566181234558711 *** This is a an edition of the Glass Widgets collection for use on phones and tablets running Android 3.x/4.x (Honeycomb and Ice Cream Sandwich). This edition is build to take advantages of the new possibilities in ICS and Honeycomb, such as resizable and scrollable widgets (see FAQ). It includes the following widgets: * Glass Clock Widget Enter a city name, or use geolocation to automatically find your location. Add more than one clock widget to your home screen in order to follow the time and weather around the world. * Glass Calendar Widget See the current date, along with the next events in your calendar. Resizeable and scrollable. * Glass News Widget Read your favorite RSS/Atom feeds from your home screen. Select one of the build in feeds (Google News, BBC, Reuters, WIRED ect.) or add your own custom feed. Resizeable and scrollable. * Glass All-In-One Widget All the above widgets combined into one 4x3 widget. FREE & PAID VERSIONS: All the widgets are semi-transparent, with a nice smoked glass look. The paid version will allow you to change the tint and transparency of the background and text as you wish. Note: If you already paid for the unlocker for the original Glass Widgets, you don't need to purchase it again. The same unlocker works for both Glass Widgets and Glass Widgets ICS. FAQ: 1) I can't find the widgets In Android 4.x widgets can be found in the widget-drawer, which is located on its own tab in the app-drawer. 2) I still can't find the widgets The most common cause of this problem is that the widgets are installed on the SD-card. Android doesn't like widgets on the SD-card. Please try to move them back to the main memory of the phone/tablet. 3) The widgets just aren't there! a) Try rebooting the phone/tablet - it usually solve most problems b) A few users running Android 3.2 have reported a bug, where they get the error message 'No more room on this home screen' during the installation of the widgets. The installation seems to work regardless, but the widgets still doesn't appear in the widget-drawer. Rebooting sometimes fix this, but if not then try this: Start the Android Market App and open the market settings by clicking the button in the upper right corner. Then disable the 'auto add shortcuts' option. Note: this option is in the settings for the market app, not the general phone/tablet settings. 4) How do I resize a widget? To resize a widget, you tab and hold on it. A bounding box will then appear around the widget, and you can tab any of the edges of the box and drag on them to increase or decrease the size of the widget. Be aware however, that your Android device needs to support resizing for this to work: You need to be running Android 4.x AND use a launcher that has support for resizing of third-party widgets. Unfortunately, that is not true for all versions of Samsung's TouchWiz, for instance. I recommend that you install one of the many third-party launchers from Google Play to fix this. Enjoy!
release_text: Since switching weather provider from the now terminated Google weather service to World Weather Online, the weather data for the widget have experienced a few problems. Also, this release contains some optimizations of the widgets themselves. The most visible of these changes includes more flexibility in configuring the All-In-One widget. v1.9.1: Fixed App assignment

Geocache placer is a tool for Geocachers, who wants to place their own Geocache, with a very precise position. By averaging many positions you will get a position with a +/- 2 meters / +/-6 ft. Use The use is very simple, press start and wait for the first calculation of an average position. You can verify the result on the loaded map and if you are satisfied with the result, you can save it with the Share function. You can press run many times until you are satisfied with the position. Geocache Placer features: * GPS Averaging * Save your caches/locations. * Import other caches via GPX, exported from c:Geo or similar APP. * 161m/528ft Circles (Distance between caches must be greater than 161m). * Google Maps V2 * OpenStreetMaps (Online and Offline). * Internal or external GPS (Using apps like "Bluetooth GPS Provider" * Export result to GPX file or share the result using SMS / MMS / Email / Dropbox and more. * Various coordinate and unit formats * English, German, French and Danish * Optional, InApp purcase to remove Ads. Permissions * In-app purchases, used to let the user have an option to buy an "No Ads option" * Storage, use to let the app put map cache on SD card and let the user import GPX files * Network communication, used for reading Google Maps, OpenStreetMap and Ads from Google. * Your location, uses to get users GPS position. If you find bugs or want to suggest new features for the APP, please send the developer a mail on Rocologo@hotmail.com . OBS: If you want to help translating the APP to a local language please contact the developer on rocologo@hotmail.com . I'm currently looking people who want to help to translate the APP to Dutch, Russian and Norwegian. It takes about 15 minutes to translate the APP to a new language.
release_text: V2.21 (121) Bug fixing V1.74(96) Direct Import of GPX file from c:geo. V1.71(92) In-App purchase Ads Free Version. V1.60(79) Faster update of imported markers V1.52(71) New Markers. Support for GMap and OSM. V1.48(67) 161m/528ft circles added V1.45(63) Save your positions V1.26 (44) Support for external GPS added using apps like "Bluetooth GPS Provider" V1.14 (26) Support for OpenStreetMaps and Google Maps V2

description: I'm so bored with persons like Dora and other BENETTA. Why are you so STUPID ?! CHANGE ****THE UNITS**** and USE ****INCHES**** NOT FEET ! - Dora, 5'2 = 62 inches, and 62 inches with 120lbs = 21.94 BMI !!! - Charles and Erik, you are not obese, just stupid. - Yes Charles, if you put 6 FEET in the INCHES text field and 175 lbs, yes the calculation can't be right. 6 foot = 72 inches with 175lbs = 23.73 BMI !!! My application can not guess that you have not learned to read - Tom, 25.38, OMG, yes, more than 25 your are overweight, BUT if you exceeded by only 0.38, or 1, seriously! think! A lipo between your ears to get to 25? It's on the house! - tyler, are you kidding ? BMI is ONLY calculated with Height and Weight (see wikipedia). IT'S WRITTEN ***Weight/lbs*** | ***Tall/inches*** IF you choose IMPERIAL UNITS (menu button) OR ***Weight/kg*** | ***Tall/cm*** IF you choose METRIC UNITS (menu button) /!\ I want to thank those who took the time to understand this simple app. <3 all ;) (and your comments) Spelling errors in my description? Certainly, but English is not my native language ;) /!\ @Matthew, you're absolutely right, I try to find time to make this small change but it is not easy. Change the unit without going through the menu and allow to set "feet & inches" is the ultimate goal to eliminate all problems. I'm totally zen ;) This app is a "Body Mass Index Calculator". BMI cannot be accurate for "athletes" or "muscular persons" ! It's written bellow, in the description of this app ! >>> "The result is valid for "normal" children/adults/m/f (but not for the muscular persons or "athletes"). The BMI formula is UNIQUE, for everybody. Why there is no GENDER and AGE ?! Again, it's written at the end of the description. **** The only thing that differs between adults and children is the "reading table". I give you a "general reading table" for ADULTS ONLY (Health Organizations did this, not me) ! The reading tables may differ between country or population (but really not so much... even if they exists). There is a more precise reading table for children 5/19 years made by WHO (World Health Organization : www.who.int). The general reading table is just an INDICATION. If you want some "real" information about your condition, ask your doctor *** My current BMI is 24.81, 1kg more and OMAGAD I'm in "overweight". And what ? I lift some weights, I run, I'm relatively muscled so there is nonsense to calculate my BMI. If you do sport, if you are in god shape, why do you want criticize a tool who isn't made for you ? If you start doing some sport, you can use this application to calculate your "first" BMI. When you begin to lose fat and gain muscle, you (maybe) will arrive in the "normal" zone. From there, if you continue to lose fat without gaining too much muscle, you can still calculate your BMI, the reading table will remain accurate for you. By cons, if you keep gaining muscle (AND/OR losing fat), from a certain point, calculate your BMI has absolutely no sense. Features: * Units: metric(cm - kg)/imperial(lbs - inches) (Use the menu button for changing that) * Languages: English, Italian, French, Spanish, German, Croatian, Korean * Long click on the result's zone to reset FOR CHANGING UNITS, USE THE MENU BUTTON! --- THE PROVIDED READING TABLE IS A "GENERAL" READING TABLE. HOWEVER, IT APPLIES WITHOUT DISTINCTION TO (ADULTS) - MEN AND WOMEN -. YOU'RE NOT NECESSARILY IN OVERWEIGHT IF YOU EXCEED THE AVERAGE HIGH MORE THAN 0.1. SO BEFORE YOU SAY "NOT ENOUGH FOR PRECISION" THINK ABOUT THAT. HOWEVER IF YOU EXCEED 1 OR MORE OF THE "NORMAL" SLICE, THE READING TABLE WILL APPLY REGARDLESS OF ITS ACCURACY. BMI IS A SIMPLE "NUMBER". IT IS USED WITH OTHER TOOLS FOR SHAPING A PROFILE OF HEALTH. Again, THIS APPLICATION IS A SIMPLE CALCULATOR. ONLY A DOCTOR WITH YOUR HISTORY OF HEALTH, YOUR BMI, ETC. CAN YOU GIVE MORE INFO ABOUT YOUR HEALTH/OVERWEIGHT/ETC accurately. --- Wikipedia info at: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Body_mass_index

Whoscall is the best app for identifying and blocking calls With Whoscall, you can instantly identify the source of calls and text messages even if the caller's number is not in your contact list. Whoscall also helps you block specific numbers. Our global database provides more than 600 million numbers. Using Whoscall, more than 20 million calls are filtered and about 500,000 malicious calls are blocked by users everyday. Start protecting your phone communication now! ★ One of the Best Apps of 2013 on Google Play in 8 countries ★ ★ "Helps Users Avoid Spam Calls" -TechCrunch ★ Features: • Instant caller ID identification Identify background information of incoming unknown calls in a blink through tags reported by other users, internet search results, and our comprehensive global database. Say Hello to Strangers! • Block unwanted calls and SMSs forever Block calls and SMSs intelligently to ensure a harassment-free calling experience, never say Hello to spammers! • Database with over 700 million phone numbers Search global database of 700,000,000 phone numbers. • Report Numbers Report name for unknown numbers to create a reliable communication network for everyone. • Offline Database (Lightning identification) - Fast phone number search and offline accessibility (This function only works for numbers in the database) **The offline databases are available only in the following countries (Taiwan, Japan, Hong Kong, Korea and USA, Brazil, Malaysia etc.) System requirements: • Android v2.3 or higher versions • Stable Internet access required for real-time lookup. • Use of 3rd party SMS apps might cause blocking failure. • Use of battery conservation apps may cause performance issues. • Starting from Android 4.4, Google has revoked SMS/MMS permissions from developers. Due to that fact, Whoscall will not be able to block SMS/MMS for Android versions 4.4 and above. Call blocking feature is not affected. • Due to system limitations of dual sim card phones, Whoscall have to be customized for each device. If your device is not in the following list, Whoscall may have some difficulties operating on that phone. We are sorry for the inconvenience. HTC one Dual 802d (Android 4.2.2) Samsung Galaxy Y GT-S6102 (Android 2.3.6) Samsung Galaxy win i8552 (Android 4.1.2) Samsung Grand Duos GT-I9082 (Android 4.1.2) RedMi 2013023 (Android 4.2.2) MTK-mini3 (Android 4.2.2) Hello, users ! Please follow us: Facebook Page: facebook.com/whoscall Say Hello on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WhosCall_APP

description: GovHK Notifications provides citizens a convenient way to receive Government information and alerts with smartphones. Users would be able to choose their preferred types of Government notifications to receive. Major functions include: ● Receive notification messages from the Government of Hong Kong SAR; ● Select categories of messages they are interested to receive; and ● Share notification messages via SMS, email, Facebook, Twitter, etc. Note: ● Notification messages are sent to mobile devices (with GovHK Notifications installed) through Google cloud services, namely Android Cloud to Device Messaging (C2DM) / Google Cloud Messaging for Android (GCM) for Android OS devices. Successful or timely reception of notification messages through their cloud services is not guaranteed by Google. ● Using GovHK Notifications, data transmission fees may be incurred for transmitting data through mobile devices. You are suggested keeping track of data usage from time to time. You may temporarily suspend receiving alerts before you travel abroad, if required. ● This app operates on Android version 2.2 or above.

The narrowed-down list will be displayed if the tap of the widget is carried out. When long press the list item, you can change status. ※Conditions of you can use state（all or unread or Archive） favorite（favorited or un-favorited） tag（all or your input tag） contentType（article or video or image） sort（newest or oldest or title or site） This software includes the work that is distributed in the Apache License 2.0.

This is the complete guide to all DSLR and mirrorless cameras and lenses that works with Canon, Nikon, Sony, Micro Four Thirds (Panasonic and Olympus), Fujifilm X mounts, including lenses from third parties such as Sigma, Tamron, Carl Zeiss, Tokina, Samyang, Leica. +++ Technical specifications of hundreds of lenses and cameras +++ Thousands of technical reviews from reputed sites such as dpreview, the-digital-picture, photozone.de, ... +++ High Quality Sample Images taken by cameras and lenses (from Flickr and 500px), zoom feature supported +++ Most updated price from Amazon.com Translations Like to have digireview in your own language? Please help with the translation at http://www.getlocalization.com/digireview/ The app provides the following features - List of all DSLR / mirrorless cameras and lenses in Canon, Nikon, Sony, Micro Four Third (Olympus and Panasonic), Fujifilm X lineup plus third parties' lenses with support for Offline browsing. - Smart filter with a lot of options for easy look up and discovery. - Detail technical specification of each camera and lens plus option to compare it side by side with other similar cameras and lenses. - Link to lens reviews from reputed review sites such as dpreview, the-digital-picture, photozone and lenstip. - View sample images taken by the camera or lens from other photographers. Contain options to filter by categories/topic such as landscape, portrait, bokeh, ... - Check lastest camera and lens price from Amazon.com. - Keep up to date with latest rumour and news of upcoming Canon and Nikon imaging products. - Bookmark feature allowing easy tracking of your current gear and wish list Keywords: Canon, Nikon, Sony, Panasonic, Olympus, Lumix, Pen, Fujifilm, cameras, digital, DSLR, mirrorless, lenses, Tamron, Sigma, Tokina, Carl Zeiss. If you like the app, please support the development of it by buying the no advertisement version of the app at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.diaphragm.pro If you face any bug or problem, please feel free to contact me by email or using the "Send Feedback" feature of the app. Please do not feedback on Google Play comment as I cannot reply you. Please describe your problem and include your device name, your Android version as well. I will do my best to help. This app is developed base on my own experiences as a photographer looking for and shopping the right lenses for my need. So hopefully it will meet the need of other fellow photographers out there as well. If you like my application please support by rating the app and spreading words to your friends. If you have any feedback or suggestion please feel free to email me at ethan.lens.review@gmail.com . I will keep it update with new content and features in the next releases. Stay tuned
release_text: Update camera and lenses database. Update for PRO version coming soon.

description: This password manager is designed to provide secure and comfortable storage of your accounts. All fields are visible on your screen and can be found easily by a quick text filter! Desktop version available (WIN, LINUX, OS X): http://house-intellect.ru/index.php?option=com_rd_download&view=download&task=dl&id=1 The Master-Key is a password invented by yourself for the protection of your data. It can be any sequence of letters, digits or numbers at your choice. Please, do not forget your master key to avoid the loss of your data due to inability to decrypt the database. Attention, please! If you are not satisfied with this application, you can refund your expenses by uninstalling it within 15 (fifteen) minutes from the moment you bought it. Make your password management easier and quicker than ever with a "Single Look" user interface, which provides a better way to manage personal data as an "all-in-one" list of accounts with corresponding usernames and passwords. The list is made simple by the text filter and the Long Press Copy function. Say goodbye to heavy multiple forms with lots of fields! All you need to remember is the Master Key of your choice, which must be entered at startup. Master Key is used to encrypt the password database and to restrict unauthorized access to your personal data. It is not stored anywhere and is only used for encryption and decryption purposes. If the database was previously encrypted with one master key it will not be successfully decrypted with another one. Please, do not forget your Master Key! KeyRing Password Manager is compatible with its Windows Mobile version. If you want to import the windows mobile account database, you should copy "config.bin" file into the "/mnt/sdcard" directory of your android phone. Even hard-reset of your phone can not damage your database, which is located on "/mnt/sdcard/" directory of your device and is auto synchronized with your google account cloud backup services. If you have forgotten your Master-Key and nevertheless want to continue using this app, you should delete the existing database file "/mnt/sdcard/config.bin". On the next launch the app will ask for a new Master-Key and will create a new empty database. In case you have a Google account and automatic synchronization enabled, application database will be automatically backed up by Google Backup Services. This behaviour provides an opportunity to automatically restore the database from Google Backup cloud after application deletion and sdcard format. The database will be restored by Google account on the next installation of the app. Supported languages: EN, RU. For your native language support please send the translation of the language file { http://house-intellect.ru/Documents/keyring-translation.odt } to the mailbox { sales@house-intellect.ru }. The localized version will be published as soon as possible.
release_text: If you have a corrupted screen experience, please update the app.

description: Berlin properties on a 3D map! smartMap Berlin allows you to interactively navigate the official 3D city model of Berlin and to explore embedded up-to-date information about commercial real estate and spaces. smartMap Berlin provides a high-detail, photorealistic 3D model of Berlin as continuous, multi-level 3D birds-eye view, which is easily to navigate and use, and allows users to easily inspect properties and their surroundings. On the 3D map, available properties are presented according to their category; additional information can be displayed. smartMap Berlin Features: - Complete, official 3D city model of Berlin included - High-quality, multi-level 3D birds-eye views - 2D-Map like navigation and zoom - rotate the map and explore - Point of interest information for several categorie - Up-to date Berlin real estate information embedded - Filtering real estate offers for available area and category - Property details - Address search Use the app for Orienttation and navigation in Berlin city, as well as for traveling, sightseeing or seeing a hotel in its surrounding. Many more applications are possible with this high detail 3D city map.
release_text: v3.3.1 - S- and U-Bahn lines where added as information overlays - The model was extended showing a new high detail model at the Spittelmarkt area - Bugfixes and further improvements of stability and performance v 3.2 - We updated the map data. Higher resolution, better Quality - Several Bugfixes and improvements v 3.1 - clustered real estate offers display the number of contained offers - added an additional POI-Layer "Smart City projects"

description: PocketGuide, the world’s leading audio city guide application, gives you tours by voice, revealing the best stories, insider hangouts and must-see sights in close to 100 major cities and tourist destinations. The app determines your location and a recording of your personal tour guide describes where you are – you don’t need to touch your phone or read from the screen. All the tours are developed by local experts who know their cities inside-and-out. You can choose from different themed tours, or just wander around the city and let PocketGuide inform you when an interesting site is nearby. The app can also record your trip: With one click you can create an amazing 3D video of the sights you see on your travels. You can use the GPS-activated voice tours for free as long as your phone is online, but that means you will have to pay roaming charges. If you pay to download the tours, you can use them offline, and save on the cost of roaming. We charge a small fee for downloading the offline features because we need to reimburse the tour guides and cover our development costs. Other features you can get for free include a map that works offline and free use of the 3D tour. Why PocketGuide? • TOURS OFFERED BY LOCAL EXPERTS - Browse more than 400 tours guided by people who make sure you see the most exciting places. • AUDIO GUIDED TOURS - It will guide you with clear audio cues and once you approach a sight it automatically starts to tell you about it • SHARE YOUR EXPERIENCES - During your tour you can take photos and add comments; from this PocketGuide automatically creates a 3D video which you can easily share with your friends • FIND GREAT PLACES - If you are tired, let our guides recommend you the best nearby restaurants and cafés • AVAILABLE OFFLINE - Once you download a city, the whole content works in offline mode so you don’t have to pay roaming charges • OFFLINE MAP - Get a free offline map and navigate in the city easily while avoiding roaming charges. Enjoyed the tours? Keep on traveling? Download PocketGuide's other versions available in other cities.
release_text: - More attractive, polished design - New vector maps: Use smaller sized maps with better zoom levels - Music listening option: Use Spotify, Google music, etc... while discovering cities. Music will automatically fade out when you reach a point of interest and continue after listening to the available information. - Chinese localization - Bug fixes

description: The mobile app of Mech Factory offers a complete, searchable, categorized database of Classic Battletech mechs, battle armors, combat vehicles and protomechs, with all relevant stats, histories and even record sheets. It provides information about all Battletech components and their board game rules too, and contains brief descriptions about the CBT powers, fractions, clans, worlds and history. This app could come handy when you play Battletech Board game, or simply read Battletech fiction. If you are a mechwarrior, this reference is just for you. Because this app uses the database of the Mech Factory ( http://battletech.rpg.hu ), it requires internet access to download larger texts or pictures. After you downloaded a design, it will remain on your device, and it will be accessible offline. To enable content downloading you have to register your free account on the Mech Factory (if you don't have it already). With a valid Mech Factory user name you can use both the web page and the mobile app. You can even star your favourite designs to build your own list, and favourites will be syncronized to the web page. First time you use this app, a simple graphical tutorial will help your initial steps. The app features a roster editor with a built in unit generator in online mode. Rosters can be syncronized to our online space to keep them safe and enable roster printing. The app needs registration to use it's all features. If you have problems with registration please contact us or try registering online (see page below). To get rid of the ads, just donate our site and we will upgrade your registration to ads free.(see about) We have included a complete BMR, because we think that it is abandonware. If you have problems with that, please report us by mail. Note, that we won't feature contents from Total Warfare due legal considerations. NOTE: Registration is needed to use all the features. That policy we cannot change - it is mostly due security reasons. Read our privacy policy about that, if you are worried about your data. If you have technical problems with registration, please send us your report. NOTE2: Commenting and rating our app low WON'T help your problem. It will just make us angry. This is a free app, we do it from enthusiasm, sacrifying many months of our free time, without any compensation for it. If you don't like it, just uninstall, no problem - that is the civilized way. And if you are treating us with friendship, we can and will always help you. :) If you behave like a troll, we will respond the same manner. (As a quick fix, please try to uninstall/install, and then register. It might help. Be sure that you are online during the registration process.) IMPORTANT NOTE: The Mech Factory App currently does not support multi user environments - the app will crash during first start. We are working on the patch that will appear in January. Sorry for this inconvenience.
release_text: New in 2.8.5: - Rolling updates New in 2.8: - Battletech Combat Trial (Battletech boardgame duel simulation (not playable, just a step by step simulation)) - Mech error corrections New in 2.7.5: - "No Ads" (Pro) option is purchasable through Google Play! New in 2.7.1: - Changed storage location to enable multi user environments New in 2.7: - Mech Factory Community Services: chat, forum, u2u messages, geolocator beta

description: The Voice+ catches all outgoing calls and uses Google Voice service to connect you with the dialed number by calling you back on your selected callback number first, then calling the number you dialed. When you make an outgoing call you can select a callback number from the displayed callback list that the Voice+ will use to connect you with the call you initiated. The Voice+ will connect you with the called partner after both Voice+ initiated calls are successfully established. *** If you have any problem with the callback then please place a quick call on the official site to check it: http://google.com/voice/m The callback can be redirected to all popular SIP clients (Sipdroid, Fring, ...) on your device to make calls over the internet or you can combine a virtual phone number + SIP (like Callcentric) to make free calls. To configure/modify callback numbers you need to login to your Google Voice account in a browser. This application uses minimal memory and resources, no voicemail/SMS/alert/notification support. A tip to combine SIP and a U.S. virtual phone number to setup the Google Voice callback: - Create a SIP (VOIP) account. (e.g. select one from http://mobilevoip.com/supported_brands ) - Create a U.S. virtual phone number and add the new SIP account. (e.g. www.callcentric.com) - Add the new virtual phone number to your Google account here: http://www.google.com/voice - Install a SIP client to your phone and setup SIP account. (e.g. SipDroid) - Login in Voice+ and make a call from the dialer or contact list and choose the phone number for callback.

安卓第一本离线字典。 无广告·离线查询·界面简洁·使用方便·繁体支持。 完整收录国标汉字21003个，汉字、拼音、部首、笔画、五笔、笔划多种检索方式. 无广告！无限制！别忘了分享给您的朋友们. Andrews first offline dictionary. No advertising offline queries · · · interface is simple and easy to use · Traditional support. Complete collection of GB 21003 characters, Chinese characters, Pinyin, radical, stroke, stroke, stroke retrieval methods. No ads! Unlimited! Do not forget to share with your friends.

Easy battery saver shows real-time information about your battery status and the remaining time of your device based on the current usage. Automatic modes: - NONE: Your device will not be affected from Battery Saver and it will continue working as it is. - REGULAR: Turns off WiFi and Bluetooth when screen is off, enables them when on. Brightness level is reduced. - SPECIAL: Disables all network connections. Suitable for calls and messages only. - SLEEP: Airplane mode is enabled between 23:30 - 07:00. No connections, calls and messages during this period. Alarm clock will still work. Just select the desired mode, click APPLY button and let Easy battery saver to take care of your battery. Other features: * BOOST button will automatically change your phone settings! * AUTO button enables SPECIAL mode when your battery life is below 15%. * NOTICES button enables notifications when some battery saving mode has been enabled and also when your battery is below 15% * TASKS activity allows you to kill processes which consume your battery's life.

Check how many famous celebrities can you guess! This is real icomania! Enjoy for Free and Have Fun!

EduTamil is a simple android applications to educate kids in learning Tamil language. To give a small background of Tamil, it is one of the ancient languages of the world and is the official language of the southern Indian state Tamil Nadu, as well as one of the official language of Srilanka, Malaysia, and Singapore. There are significantly large communities of Tamil speakers in Mauritius and South Africa, as well as groups of more recent Tamil speaking emigrants living in Canada, Australia, USA and in many western European countries. Key Features of EduTamil: * Learn Alphabets - Uyir Ezhuthukkal (Vowels) * Learn Alphabets - Mei Ezhuthukkal (Consonants) * Learn Alphabets - UyirMei Ezhuthukkal (Compounds) Chart * Learn Basic Words - Varthaikkal (Words) * Learn Basic Numerals - Ilakkangal * READ Mode - Play with Tamil alphabet sound * WRITE Mode - Trace over the alphabet for the kids to practice * English Equivalent Text for Tamil Alphabets (Vowels & Consonants) with their English sound Other Features of EduTamil: * Portrait and Landscape orientation modes * One touch/tap full screen mode * Swipe Navigation * Button Navigation

Tamil Ulaga Neethi is a simple Android application to bring one of the most popular & famous Tamil classic literature work learnt during our childhood/school days. Ulaga Neethi expresses or can say teaches oneself to be of having good thoughts and well-being in life by following the Neethi. It was authored by Ulaganaadhar Key Features: * Tamil Ulaga Neethi's displayed in native Tamil language * Social sharing of the Neethi screenshot as image. It can be shared via Facebook, Google+, Instagram, Twitter, Email Clients, Bluetooth etc.,. * Bookmark feature to add your favorite Neethi's and view them later quickly * Quick view feature of all Neethi's and favorite ones in single list * Goto feature to go to the particular Neethi directly by entering the number * User Preferences - Modify default user preferences or settings * Font Preference - Choose a Tamil font of your preference from a list of four available fonts of your choice * Font Size - Set the Tamil font size (small, normal, large, extra-large) of your choice Other Features: * Portrait and Landscape orientation modes * One touch/tap full screen mode * Swipe Navigation with Neethi number in title * Button Navigation * Start reading from beginning and continue to read from where you left previously

With Gallery Feature With Phone Call Control With Alarm Control With System RAM Cleaner WINNER at INTEL CodeFest 2013 Air Control allows you to control following features: 1. Air Gallery - Control your Images using Air Gallery - Wave once for Next Image - Wave twice for Previous Image 2. Music - Control your music player using Air Gesture Control - Place and remove your hand (Hover) to play music - Place and remove your hand (Hover) again to pause music - Wave once to play Next song - Wave twice to play Previous song 3. Unlock Screen - Control your phone screen UnLock using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to UnLock your screen 4. Record Audio - Record audio data using Air Gesture Control - Place and remove your hand to start recording Audio - Place and remove your hand again to Stop recording Audio - Your recorded file would inside /sdcard/AirGestureControl/DateTime.mp3 5. Push Ups - Select PushUp check box using Air Gesture Control - Place your phone below your chest and start doing PushUps - When done with workout, remove PushUp check box 6. Flash Light (Torch) - Control your phone Flash Light using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on Flash light(Torch) - Place and remove your hand again to switch off Flash light(Torch) 7. Ringer Volume (Silent mode) - Control your phone volume using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to Silent phone - Place and remove your hand again to Ringer mode your phone 8. WiFi - Control your phone WiFi using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on WiFi - Place and remove your hand again to switch off WiFi 9. Data Connection - Control your phone data connection using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on Data Connection - Place and remove your hand again to switch off Data Connection 10. GPS - Control your phone GPS using Air Control - Place and remove your hand to switch on GPS - Place and remove your hand again to switch off GPS 11. Bluetooth Get all of these awesome features on your phone now. How It Works: Air Gesture Control is a PROXIMITY sensor based application. Every phone has this sensor to switch off screen when talking over phone Proximity Controls: 1. Hovering - Place your hand over Proximity sensor and remove your hand. 2. Wave Once - Wave within the range of Proximity sensor quickly once 3. Wave Twice - Wave within the range of Proximity sensor quickly one after other, two times Great for: Driving - Focus only on driving, safety first Press Conference- Wave and record while others are searching for a way to record PushUps - Use Air Gesture Control to keep track of your push ups At your desk - No need to look at your phone, change to next song by waving Cooking - Hands covered with oil, well just wave at your phone for next song Cleaning - Don't worry about getting dirt on your phone Eating - No more food stain on your phone screen Working Out- Don't fall off the treadmill while changing to next song Show off - Well be a Ninja, Jedi or Shaolin monk, take your pick **IMPORTANT** Air Gesture Control is tested on HTC, Samsung, Sony, LG, Micromax, Karbonn, Lenovo and Lava phones If there is a problem, please email me at intankcorp@gmail.com and give me a chance to figure it out before leaving a bad review! Known Issues: If your phone/Tablet does not have PROXIMITY sensor, Air Gesture Control will not work on your device. :( Permissions Needed: Bluetooth: To switch on Bluetooth Camera: To switch on Flash Light (Torch) Microphone: To record Audio data Storage: To store recorded Audio data Network communication: To switch on WiFi Tags: Air Control, Wave Control, Proximity Control, Proximity Sensor Developed on HTC ONE X
