삼성 모아키 키보드 스킨 (삼성단말용) (본 어플리케이션은 삼성 Galaxy A,S(I,II),K,U,Nexus,Note 등 삼성 단말 전용입니다.) 모아키는 터치스크린 기반 단말에서 한글 입력을 가장 쉽고 빠르게 입력 할 수 있도록 제공하는 키보드 프로그램입니다. 자음을 누른 후 간단한 제스쳐 만으로 한글의 자음과 모음을 한 번에 입력 할 수 있습니다. 보다 빠르고 정확하게 입력할 수 있는 모아키를 지금 경험해 보세요. (* 버전 1.0.111117부터는 긋기로 모든 모음을 커버 할 수 있게 됨에 따라, 기본모드가 긋기 모드로 변경되었습니다. 기존 팝업모드를 사용하고 싶은 경우 설정에서 활성화 하시거나 Space키를 길러 눌러 사용 하실 수 있습니다.) "천지인 만큼 쉽지는 않습니다. 하지만 속도와 편안함이 달라집니다. 지금 분당 100자(300타)에 도전해 보세요!" ■ 모아키 스킨 설정 방법 처음 설치하시는 경우, 다운 및 설치 완료 후 "열기"를 누르시면 새로운 스킨으로 적용된 모아키 키보드를 사용하실 수 있습니다. ■ Since 2006 모아키 모아키는 2006년부터 터치스크린 기반 단말에서의 빠르고 편리한 입력을 위해 다양한 접근을 시도 및 개선하고 있습니다. ■ 모아키와 소통 모아키는 전용 twitter나 facebook을 통해 주요 업데이트 공지 및 사용자 소통 창구로 활용하고자 합니다. - Twitter : http://mobile.twitter.com/secmoakey - Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/secmoakey ---- 개발자 연락처 : 02-2255-0114 Samsung moahki keyboard skins (for Samsung UE) (In this application, the Samsung Galaxy A, S (I, II), K, U, Nexus, Note, Samsung UE-only, etc.) Moahki Hangul input from the touch screen to the base station so that you can quickly and easily provide a keyboard program. Consonants, and then only with a simple gesture of consonants and vowels of Hangul, you can enter at a time. You can type faster and more accurately in moahki Experience now. (* Starting with version 1.0.111117 flick to be able to cover all the vowels as the default mode has been changed to flick mode. Existing pop-up mode is used if you want to bring up settings, press the Space key to activate or use. ) "Tenchijin not as easy as it is, but depending on the speed and comfort now to 100 characters per minute (300 L) to challenge me!" ■ How to set the skin moahki If you are a first-time installation, complete the download and installation of the "open" a new skin applied to the press, you can use the keyboard to moahki. ■ Since 2006 moahki Moahki in 2006 based on a touch screen input terminal for the fast and convenient access to a variety of options to try and improve. ■ moahki and communication Through a dedicated twitter or facebook moahki major update notifications and want to utilize your communication window. - Twitter: http://mobile.twitter.com/secmoakey - Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/secmoakey

GOLF TIPS, GOLF LESSONS AND GOLF INSTRUCTION WITH PGA TOUR PRO KEVIN STREELMAN "GOLF LIKE A TOUR PRO WITH KEVIN STREELMAN" FEATURED ON: Golf Channel Sports Illustrated - What's Hot USA Today.com Golf Week NBC-TV Phoenix TechNews Arizona DID YOU KNOW THAT 90% OF POOR SHOTS BY AMATEURS ARE THE RESULT OF BAD SET-UPS, NOT POOR SWINGS? GOLF LIKE A TOUR PRO was created to help golfers of all handicaps score better on the course with concise golf instruction and a golf lesson that will reduce strokes with a more accurate golf swing KEVIN STREELMAN, a top 30 ranked Professional on the PGA Tour and ranked in the top 70 in the World, will show you how to hit 50 different shots. These are the kind of tips that golfer of all levels can use. He will cover everything from the tee shot to the green. How to do it is what this APP is all about. The difference between the Tour Pro and the everyday golfer is not just the money or the execution, but KNOWING WHAT TO DO WITH THE SHOT. How to align your feet? Where to aim? Where the ball should be set up? Even the correct club to use. Kevin analyzes each situation and gives you the proper set-up in summary form as well as the strategic adjustments needed to make that good shot. You will see how the laws of physics combined with proper mechanics will make you a better golfer. You will also get a Pro Tip from Kevin for each shot. Kevin will even show you and talk you through what the set-up should look like with our enhanced video feature. You can even see Kevin hit the shot in slow motion. But best of all, you can take your Smartphone on the course and quickly look up what you should do in seconds with just a couple of touches. No more trying to remember what a book or video told you to do. You can even sit in the airport or on the plane and review from your Smartphone. Its cost is less then a sleeve of balls!!! Visit us at HYPERLINK " http://www.ssquaredgolf.com " www.ssquaredgolf.com Features: Shot selection from 9 different locations on a hole: 50 shot set-ups from different lies: Analysis of each situation and what adjustments and why you need to make them to hit the best shot A special tip from Kevin that emphasizes the key elements that the Pro’s always think about when preparing a shot A video that shows the proper set-up for all the shots with audio explaining exactly how to do it A separate slow motion video that shows Kevin executing the shot The ability to pause throughout both videos to study the shot techniques An easy review of all summaries, lies, and strategies with just a slide of the screen Ability to create a favorites folder for those frequent shots on the course and at the driving range
release_text: Corrections made to run fast and efficiently on Droid and all smartphones.

안녕하세요. 함께 하는 금연, 금연 일지 입니다. 금연 일지를 통해 매일 매일 당신의 흡연량을 체크해 보세요. 흡연량을 체크와 동시에 유해 물질 흡입량, 낭비금액, 수명 단축 시간이 자동으로 계산되어 집니다. 또한 다른 사용자 분들이 작성한 게시물을 통해 금연에 도움이 되는 정보( 금연 장점, 단점, 금연 방법, 금연 의지를 다지는 글등)를 얻을 수 있습니다. 그리고 매주 게시판에 작성된 게시물 중 금연에 도움이 되거나 많은 분들에게 호응이 좋았던 게시물은 베스트 게시물로 선정됩니다. 여러분이 작성해주신 소중한 게시물 하나가 많은 분들을 금연을 성공으로 이끌수 있습니다. 이곳에 계신분들과의 정보 공유를 통해 꼭 금연에 성공 하시길 바라겠습니다. 여러분의 건강을 지킬 수 있는 금연 일지. 지금 시작하세요. ※ 금연 일지는 다음과 같은 기능을 제공합니다. 1. 금연 일지 쓰기 2. 금연 일지 수정 / 삭제 3. 베스트 게시물 기능을 통한 금연 욕구 상승과 정보를 제공합니다. 4. 금연일 수 자동 계산 5. 금연 / 흡엽 량 월별 보기 or 전체 보기 6. 유해물질 흡입량 계산, 단축 수명 계산, 낭비 금액 계산 7. 금연 성공기 게시판 8. 고민 상담 게시판 9. 금연 방법 게시판 10. 담배값 설정 (기본값 2015년 이전 2500원, 2015년 이후 4500원) 만든이 : 변두리 프로그래머 Good evening. description: Practice counting tables, plus, minus, times, divide and percentage sums. The plus, minus, times and divide sums can be made with 1 or 2 fractions or without fractions. The ideal way to practice maths for kids without parents, for kids on the primary school and the first 2 years of secondary school. If you miss a language, send an email.

The application allows one-button set to send SMS message to specified phone number. Assign each button its own phone number, and your own message. Application will be useful for the control of various devices with built-in GSM module. * Password protection * 20 programmable buttons * Changing names buttons * Disabling buttons * Change text color * Change font * Request the delivery report messages * Automatic exit from application * Automatic launch default SMS application * Backup all settings * User-friendly interface * Easy and reliable operation DOES NOT CONTAIN ADVERTISING!

ABC Ping is a computer network administration utility used to test the reachability of a host on an Internet Protocol (IP) network and to measure the round-trip time for messages sent from the originating host to a destination computer. Application supports both 3G and Wi-Fi networks. * Stylish and ergonomic design * Ping options * Support running in background * Animated icon in status bar * Internal SQLite database for hosts * Backup and restore the database * Other useful features * Support for tablets DOES NOT CONTAIN ADVERTISING!

Gravity Sim lets you create your own virtual universe right on your phone or tablet! Using a slightly modified version of real world physics, Gravity Sim provides an excellent gravity experience unparalleled on the play store. Throw planets around stars, moons around planets, customize everything in your universe. Features: - Realistic model of gravity - Path tracing - Time control - Zoom in / out - Variable masses of every object - 5 classes of objects with various textures - Lock on and follow objects in orbit - Multi-touch support - Unlimited 2D universe to explore and create - Cycle through objects you placed - Intuitive, easy to use interface
release_text: Updated according to the feedback I got in the reviews. New features include: - Auto orbit function - New collision & destroy effects - Fixed the crash when using the cycle objects button

description: This is like a bingo cage or a bingo caller in your pocket. This app is a replacement for your bingo cages. Play Bingo/Tambola/Housie anywhere, anytime with a small group of friends or play in a big party with many people. You can even use this Bingo Number Generator app in places where it is not possible to use a bingo cage at all, like while traveling with a group of friends in a bus. This app is created by a 5th grader.

app_name: 多多学英语 妈妈在哪儿
description: 本应由5个模块供小朋友选择: 1.【中文诵读】:中文逐句诵读,可暂停、上句、下句; 2.【英文诵读】:英文逐句诵读,可暂停、上句、下句; 3.【跟我唱歌】:对照文字逐句唱歌,可暂停、上句、下句; 4.【对照练习】:中、英对照,逐句讲解,并对重点词汇圈点解释,可暂停、上句、下句; 5.【看图认词】:对照图片,中、英对照,学习单词,可暂停、上个、下个。 功能特点: **双语教学:在学习童话故事的同时加强英文听,读水平。 **动画界面:全新动画设计,充满童趣。 **图片精美:鲜艳亮丽,手绘卡通风格,易于理解,便与记忆。 **互动练习:通过学单词,跟读,英文歌曲等互动环节,激发孩子的学习热情 **优美配乐:以优美的名曲为音乐背景,帮助孩子更好的领悟故事意境。 《多多学英语》系列共有40多个应用,专为孩子英语学习方面而设计,搜索"多多"下载更多应用。 妈妈在哪儿(Where is my mom),中英对照看童话,边看边学英语。适合4岁到12岁儿童。 一个温暖的春日,小鸡彼彼正在院子里玩....

Don't you just feel like jumping up and down when you receive the present you wished for, girls? Baby Barbie wanted a bicycle so badly and her parents surprised her with a girly pink Kitty bike the other day. Imagine how happy she is now! Hang out with Barbie on a fun bike ride. Help her clean up her new Kitty gadget first washing it with lots of soap bubbles and water. You can select a different color and body design, turning it into a lighter or darker pink and decorating it with flowers, strawberries, bunnies or cute teddy bears instead. Experience the baby girl's first bicycle accident and give her the first aid. This is what happens if you don't watch where you're going! She stumbled against a rock on the pavement and injured her head and arm. Disinfect the wounds with a sterilizing lotion and cotton pads. Remove the debris and apply bandages. Baby Barbie will be more careful next time she rides her fancy bike. How about some dress up suggestions for the little girl? What clothes, footwear and accessories should she wear for this awesome outdoor activity? Rummage in her fashionable closet and pick appropriate dresses, tops and bottoms. Add a pair of trendy sport shoes or flat sandals and sassy chic sunglasses to complete each outfit. Have a fabulous time playing our newest baby game!

Hello Cute Babies! Here comes our stylish Barbie doll with a major challenge for you: in only a few days from now she will be attending her prom and she’s thinking to give herself a major change for this event… one that involves scissors, styling tools and, of course, glam hair accessories! Ladies, Princess is looking for a brand-new haircut for her prom night and she can’t wait for you to start creating the one that is sure to leave all her senior colleagues mouth-opened! So, are you ready to show of your amazing hairstyling skills? Great! If so, get the Princess Prom Haircuts game started and first of all, prepare her gorgeous blonde hair-locks for the styling process by using the best shampoo on the market to wash it up and a delicate conditioner to give it a gloving of health look! Use the professional hair blower that you have at your disposal in this online hair game for girls to obtain a natural volume for her hair and then ladies. well, feel free to go to the net page of the game and start cutting her hair until you reach the desired length! Pick from a selection of three different hair styling tools the needed one to finish Princess's prom updo in style. Great jobs ladies! Now what about changing the color of her hair, too by adding some bits of sweet candy-pink, lovely lavender or maybe some bold green shades for a major transformation? Pick out your favorites and then look for a glam evening dress to dress Princess up for her prom! Don’t forget to also select a really nice hair accessory for a complete, jaw-dropping prom look! Enjoy playing this brand new Princess Game
release_text: Updated localization language and level options. Fixed bugs.

description: Owning a car is a great responsibility and can be lots of fun, and with this Clean My New Beetle cleaning game you can easily take on the challenge of cleaning your new pink beetle so it is ready for the open road. Here you can easily take charge and place the rubbish in the rubbish bin, pick off all your personal items including hat, bags, sunglasses, and more, before easily scrubbing the pieces of dirt and grime from your cars exterior! Once you have finished tidying it up you can then complete you car's appearance by giving it a quick and easy wash over to bring out its beautiful pink colored body. So if you want to own your very own car, why not take charge now with this Clean My New Beetle cleaning game today. Features: • CLEAN up game fun! Remove all the rubbish and throw it in the rubbish bin! • PICK off any of your personal items to help clean your car to make it look tidy! • SCRUB the dirt patches from your beetle using the scrubbing brush! • CLEAN your new beetle by giving it a final wash down with clean water! • WATCH your clean car shine in the sunlight ready for driving! • ENJOY this beetle car cleaning game with your friends and family!

description: Learn to play guitar With JAMSTAR ACOUSTICS…an interactive guitar app that works with any GUITAR! Learn chords, scales, rhythm and songs from the biggest names in music. Want to learn to play songs on guitar by The Beatles, Green Day, Led Zeppelin, Foo Fighters, KISS, R.E.M. and more? Now you can with JAMSTAR! With Jamstar Acoustics your device HEARS YOU play and gives REAL TIME feedback. Over 100 courses are FREE, plus you’ll have unlimited access to Jamstar Acoustics’ intuitive guitar tuner that guides you string-by-string. "Accurate and easy to use...Those looking for an interactive approach to learning guitar should check it out." - Guitar World “Jamstar is a game changer!” – Tonefreqs.com "Jamstar makes learning guitar fun and easy. The combination of side scrolling TAB view with the colour coded strings creates the perfect learning environment." - GuitarNoize.com "A Cool Free App That Teaches You To Play The Guitar!" – Techcrunch "App of the Day! A Guitar Learning App That Won't Hold You Back" - Gizmodo “I wonder where'd I'd be if I had this app when I started playing guitar.” Thomas Ian Nicholas, Professional Musician, Actor - @TINBand “I've downloaded 1,000,000 guitar apps with no benefit at all. This one made a change in my music life...I can actually play now! Beware girls here I come ;) Thanks Jamstar!” - Benjamin112 Jamstar proudly features DR NEON™ MULTI-COLOR strings! There is a direct correlation between color and improved learning efficiency and we've developed the "COLOR-PLAY" system with DR as a result. Using DR NEON™ Multi-Color sets on your guitar and virtually in Jamstar, you will easily see which fret to hit on which string more quickly and accurately. Jamstar Acoustics is the most powerful guitar-teaching tool available today. No additional hardware is needed. You will never need to download another guitar learning application, ever!
release_text: v2.2.1 * Enhanced Accuracy: Your device will recognize the notes and chords you are playing even more precisely than before! * Faster Response Time: We've upgraded the platform so the feedback you get while playing guitar is practically instantaneous!

description: Google has pushed an update again to Google Maps that has broken the app. I hope to have a fix this weekend. Fishing Weather is a simple app used to determine if the weather forecast is good enough to go fishing based on your preferences. Set your preferred weather conditions for temperature, rain, wind and a fishing icon is displayed if the weather is within those parameters, a house icon is displayed otherwise. Features - New weather data provider with a more accurate weather forecast - Touch the daily weather forecast to get a detailed hourly weather forecast - Select a forecast start and end time to get the forecast for the hours you are actually awake - Redesigned use interface with scalable images that look much better - Scales beautifully on both small and large screens - Fast load time - Small size - English and metric weather data selected automatically based on your location - Location based on GPS, zip code, city/state or city/country (GPS is slow, entering a location is much faster) Powered by Forecast http://forecast.io Please email me with any issues or feature requests before giving the app a negative rating.
release_text: - Fixed loading issue when GPS is turned off or location not found

description: If you have ever wanted to be a princess and style your very own clothes then now you can with this Pretty Princess Makeover game! Here you can prepare your princess by washing and rinsing her skin, popping her annoying pimples, cleansing and moisturizing her face to make her skin soft and smooth, and plucking her eyebrows so they are neat and tidy. Once you have given her beautiful soft features you can then accessorize her lovely face by changing her eye shadow, lipstick, eye color, eyelashes, hair style, jewellery, and dress design! So if you love princesses and love to give makeovers then the pretty princess makeover game is just right for you. Features: • WASH and rinse her face so it is nice and clean and fresh. • POP pimples to remove any excess dirt to make it nice and smooth. • CLEANSE her face again to remove any excess scarring. • AIR her face to make her skin look and smell sweet. • APPLY the face mask and wait before removing it to complete her soft skin look. • PLUCK her eyebrows to they are nice and straight to add extra beauty. • ACCESSORIZE by changing her lipstick, eye shadow, eyelashes, blush, eye color, hair style, dress design, and jewellery.
release_text: V2.0.0 * New hair salon level added * More things to dress and more color for the makeover.

description: EGG DEFENDER: an evolution based tower defense game! You play as the brood mother of a rapidly expanding nest of ravenous creatures. Lay and hatch eggs to defend your nest. It is your duty to both protect your eggs and feed your young! Eradicate the indigenous slime population by devouring their biomass. Use it to evolve your children into larger, deadlier weapons of destruction. description: "Fiete" is a beautifully illustrated, interactive picture book for children between 1 to 3 years. "Fiete" has completely omitted advertising, in-app purchases and there are no links from the game to the internet. We want parents to feel at ease when your children are playing with our app. ABOUT FIETE: We see "Fiete" as an alternative to the interactive children's book: In a playful way, with attention to detail and design competence is the motor skills and the ability to combine the small encouraged. The game does not have any written instructions, making it suitable for children of all ages. Together with their parents, children learn to help "Fiete" in his everyday life. A total of fifteen tasks is waiting to be discovered by them. Sounds and animations are used to encourage and motivate the little ones. description: Let´s start from 1 december 2014. Together with Fiete you are waiting for christmas eve. Till then you unwrap a little present every day. When children wait for christmas together with Fiete, unwrap a little present every day, play and decorate, the time until christmas eve is passing much faster. With the help of this lovely and very atmospheric app children spend the Advent season with sailor Fiete visiting him in his apartment every day. And every day there is a nice little surprise. So waiting for Santa Claus is not that difficult anymore. And what may Fiete get as his Christmas present? – Hush, we do not want to give away yet. All advent presents can be combined freely to allow a maximum of creativity. To build something from the toy blocks or have the little toy car jump over a bridge is just as much fun as deciding how to decorate Fiete’s apartment. This wonderful interactive advent calendar app is a little pre-Christmas present for all Fiete fans. Just download for free and look forward to the 1st of December. HIGHLIGHTS • Rejoice each day over a new advent surprise • Get creative – play around freely • Look at how Fiete´s house gets ready for christmas • Lovingly designed and painted • Intuitive controls You like Fiete? This app help kids practice in a fun and rewarding way. They will look forward to practice and you will watch them learn new things. Includes time tested activities to develop maths and language skills. Maths activities include –Addition Subtract Drills in various forms, Times Tables, Fractions and Telling Time. Synonyms – Antonyms and Sight words will help increase the vocabulary of child. Spellings activity is also included to complete language skills. Activities include applying concept of addition and subtraction and apply multiple number concepts at a time. 1.Missing Numbers – Find the missing numbers. Like 10-?=4 4+?=6 2.Balance the Apples – Child can calculate using fingers 6+5=11. But ask in a different manner – Which two numbers make 11. Here the child will solve problems like these. 3.Even Odd Numbers – This activity helps the child in applying more than one concept. The child has to find even/odd numbers greater than or less than a given number. Finding only even / odd numbers or greater than/less than numbers may not be a challenge but when asked together it becomes. 4.Combinations of Tens ( 10,20,30,40…)- Activity to make the child comfortable with these numbers. 5.Times tables – Child can practise tables from 1-12. and many more

Our activities and games are designed keeping in mind 1st graders' abilities, level of skill and curriculum. We have easy-to-use navigation buttons and voice instructions.They will help homeschooling your child. These activities help them learn new words and practice letter-sound relationships and are effective tools when it comes to teaching different maths concepts important at this stage – Addition, Subtractions, Patterns and Ordering Numbers. Apart from this kids can also be creative keep themselves engaged with other fun games like drawing, coloring, joining dots, mazes and memory match. Addition And subtraction are taught in a very interactive way using all the tools – figures, sticks and numberline. A teacher is also there to assist them. Overview- a. Addition and Subtraction with help from numberline, finger counting, and a teacher to help with b. Phonics Long Vowels words. c. Phonics Blends and Digraphs Words d. Exhaustive Spelling List e. Patterns f. Ascending and descending order g. Drawing and Painting h. Colouring the pictures i. Amazing Mazes j. Join the dots to find hidden pictures k. Memory Match l. Nouns and Verbs m. Compound Words

Give your children a head start by teaching them phonics at an early age! Phonics Match is designed to help young children blend and segment words by learning the 42 sounds of the English language, rather than the alphabet. Features: - 42 different cards with their own letter/word - Fully voiced with correct phonics pronunciation - Colourful graphics with support for most resolutions - Collect stickers after completing a game - Uses the Jolly Phonics system (widely used in UK primary schools) - No ads that your child(ren) could tap on - No in-app purchases or unlocks, full features available Phonics Match includes a wide selection of colourful cards and children can match pairs within specific phonics groups or can play a fully random game of matching pairs.

description: Phonics Puzzles is designed to help children understand the different phonetic sounds, rather than the alphabet. The app is divided into the different jolly phonics groups and includes a wide selection of colourful puzzles and children can complete puzzles within specific phonics groups or can play a randomised endless game of puzzles. Features: - Over 180 different puzzles! - Includes 3 languages! British English, American English and Australian English. - Uses the Jolly Phonics system (widely used in UK primary schools). - Includes randomised quick play mode and specific phonics groups play. - Fully voiced with correct phonics pronunciation (friendly professional voice). - Change between lower and uppercase letters. - Colourful graphics with support for many phone/tablet resolutions. - Parental gate prevents your children to go out of the app. - Full features available, no in-app purchases!

ORD MEMORY ingår i serien Lära Läsa Åk1 från JMAppar och är tänkt som komplement, stöd och omväxling till den vanliga läxan. Appen följer de riktlinjer och rekommendationer som finns i Skolverkets Lgr11 angående kunskapsmål för lågstadiet. Steg två i att lära sig läsa är att få "flyt" i läsande. Detta får man genom att man kommer ihåg mellanord och vanligt förekommande ord i "bildminnet", så att man inte behöver läsa ordet, utan direkt ser vad som står i texten. Appen är ett klassiskt memoryspel där man skall hitta det matchande ordet bakom brickorna. När man hittat det matchande ordet så försvinner brickorna, och man har hittat en pusselbit som sen blir till en hel bild. Varje gång man vänder en bricka så säger en röst vad som står på brickan. Detta för att förstärka lärandeprocessen med både bild och ljud. Appen innehåller även de mest förekommande orden i mattetal, som förberedelse inför matematik i Årskurs två. Appen innehåller de 200 vanligaste orden i Svenska språket. WORDS MEMORY included in the series Learning Reading AK1 from JMAppar and is meant to complement, support and variety to the usual homework. The app follows the guidelines and recommendations set out in the Agency Lgr11 regarding learning outcomes for primary school. Step two in learning to read is to "float" in reading. This is achieved by one remembers betwee the North and frequently used words in "Picture Memory" so that you do not need to read the word, without directly seeing what is in the text. The app is a classic memory game in which you must find the matching word behind the tiles. When you have found the matching word will disappear washers, and they have found a piece of the puzzle which then turns into a full image. Every time you turn a tray so says a voice what is on the tray. This is to enhance the learning process with both picture and sound. The app also contains the most frequently used words in math problems, in preparation for mathematics in Grade two. The app contains the 200 most common words in the Swedish language.

description: Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) is a debilitating illness for sufferers. Treatments for IBS vary include changes to diet, anti-spasmodic medications, muscle relaxants, and stress reduction. Unfortunately, these treatment methods do not help every person with IBS. So how can hypnotherapy help? Over a decade of scientific research has shown hypnotherapy to be successful for alleviating the symptoms of irritable bowel syndrome and it can produce positive results in over 80% of the people who use it. Hypnotherapy first helps by relaxing the body. Relaxation improves blood flow to the gut - something that stress tends to inhibit - and so improves digestion and the movement of food through the bowel. Visualisation techniques used during the therapy, sometimes termed as "gut related therapy" help to aid the relaxation and reduce the painful symptoms. It is a uniquely comfortable form of treatment. It is relaxing, easy, enjoyable and completely without negative side-effects. Don't just trust us, read what some of our recent customers had to say:- "Dear Mr. Roberts, You do not know me, but I recently purchased the IBS Rx CD from you and I thought you might like to know of the outcome. I have suffered from IBS for 25 years on and off and have tried literally so many Rx's over the years, to no avail. I have had hypnosis several times, usually with good effect whilst undergoing the Rx with the therapist, but sadly not as much benefit from the tapes alone when using them by myself. They have all in their own way, allowed me to experience some degree of self-hypnosis and relaxation, but I have to say, I have never come across one quite like yours! It is wonderful. I really feel like I have been to those places and go so deep it is amazing. The way you use your voice is incredibly calming and I just love that feeling as if my body with all it's aches and pains does not belong to me during those times. I cannot yet comment upon how it has affected my IBS, it is too soon yet to know and I also have Endometriosis which means that at some times there is not much I can do about the pain no matter what I do. But in a general sense, these problems have made me feel very stressed and panicky even when I do not have an attack, because I am always anticipating one. But put it this way, I normally have to play a tape nearly every day to get an effect. In your case, however, the general effects are instantaneous and seem to last days, my sense of well being and calmness is great. It lasts me 2 weeks! Also, I used to consider it penance to have to lie still and listen to the other tapes, couldn't seem to settle. Whereas I find myself looking forward to yours as a treat. Anyway, I'll sign off now. Just thought you might like to know the effectiveness of your therapies. I am a Registered Nurse myself, so I know how important it is to be aware of results. Many thanks." Rita O'Neill, Bradford, UK

This app is for all developers who are developing a app using App Inventor and want to learn more about the activity starter component. App Inventor ActivityStarter lets you play with intent activities and has more than 150 example demo activities. This app is actually a kind of Activity Starter component. You can make your own activity with all the fields you have in the Activity Starter component in App Inventor and execute the activity. If you want to learn more about the activity starter component in app inventor or are you looking for example activities, then this app is for you! In this app you will find example intent activities such as: -Action and classes to all android settings. -open, edit and view content such as image, audio, video or a file. -Search for content on web or phone. -Call, Dial, Email, SMS, MMS. Pick, Call or edit contact -Geo-location activities for Google Maps, Street view or other route app. -Photo and video activities -Google play and install and uninstall apps activities -Save text to sdcart, copy text to clipboard. Share text with Whatsapp, Hangouts, Drive, Dropbox, Mega. -External App inventor tools activity demos for AsUtil, Phone Picker for App Inventor, vkTools * More about App Inventor maintained by the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT). http://appinventor.mit.edu/ * Note that this app has a lot of permissions because it has to be able to do any activity that you can make in app inventor. * You can also download the source code of this app, see http://code.google.com/p/appinvactivitystarter

This is the full and free version of "Where Am I? GeoCode" for Android(earlier known as "Geocoding" application for Android). This application is enables you to find the latitude and longitude of any address you specify and view on the map! Developed by a 13year old developer! Way to use this Application: Enter the address in the “Address field” for which you would like to generate the GeoCode. Eg : Maidenhead SL6 4HN, UK (enter full address for more accurate results) : 910 , Rockefeller Drive , Sunnyvale , CA 94087 (enter full address for more accurate results) : Wilson Garden, Bangalore, 560027 (enter full address for more accurate results) The "GeoCode" button will convert the specified address to latitude and longitude. The latitude and longitude generated can be viewed at the bottom-right of your screen next to the “About” button. The "Set Current Location as Address” button will automatically set the Address field to your current location. The "Save Address" button will save the address entered in the address field to the history. The "Delete Address" button is used to delete any previously entered address from the history. The "Load Address" button is used to copy any address from the history into the address field. The "Map It" button is used to view the “GeoCoded address” in map or satellite view. Feel free for any queries at sivan.sundar@gmail.com Your valuable ratings and comments are most welcome. Tested and working in HTC LEGEND!

Have you ever wanted to impress your friends with magic? Maybe you've always considered magic just too difficult. Ever thought it was possible to do a magic coin trick with your android smartphone? Well, look no further than the Magic Coin Trick. Here's a magic trick that anyone can do. All you need is the trusty magic coin trick software and be ready to amaze your friends. How the trick works is simple. Hide a coin in the hand you are holding the phone with. On the phone screen, select a coin. Move the coin around on the smart phone to show how real the coin is. Five seconds after you release the coin on the screen, the coin slowly will disappear. In the five seconds, tell them that you've trapped the coin inside... or that you've magically digitized the coin using a space aged digitizer. Finally, the coin disappears. Out of nowhere, drop the real coin from your hand. As the real coin magically appears right before their eyes, you'll be the toast of the town with this trick. This is a magic trick for anyone beginners or experts. Besides coin, you can even choose a paper clip to perform this magic. Keywords: Magic, trick, coin, paper clip, amazing, fun, magician, disappear, friend, quarter, dime, penny, nickel, cool.

Russian Football 2012/2013 LIVE! - is an application about Russian Football Premier League. With this application you are able to watch the events in Russian Football Premier League in real time. LiveScore mode (minute-by-minute translation) together with Push notifications will not let you miss important events of a match (The beginning of a match, Goals, Fouls, Substitutions) With the application you will have access to text translations and football fans’ forums. Also you can find full information about football clubs- current list of players with their personal information and photo, historical information, form and symbolics, texts and music of anthems. The classic strategy game 'Hammurabi' (originating in 1968) has arrived for the Android Smartphone! Rule the Kingdom of Sumeria by managing your precious resources: land, people, and food. During each year of your reign (typically 10 years), your steward, Hammurabi, will ask you the following questions: 1) HOW MANY ACRES DO YOU WISH TO BUY? 2) HOW MANY ACRES DO YOU WISH TO SELL? 3) HOW MANY BUSHELS DO YOU WISH TO FEED YOUR PEOPLE? 4) HOW MANY ACRES DO YOU WISH TO PLANT WITH SEED? At the end of your ruling term, your performance will be evaluated and then compared with famous rulers from the past! This version stays true to the input methods of the original game - you can enter only one response at a time. Settings for 'Difficulty' and 'Term Length' can be adjusted, affecting gameplay strategy.

description: Have fun rotating your phone and watching the balls fall across the screen as if they were really there. G-Balls is an application featuring a lot of balls on your phone screen, affected by gravity like in the real world. Rotate your phone to see balls bouncing and moving like if they were really inside your phone screen. Try it! G-Balls uses real physics movements to simulate balls movement and phone accelerometer to detect rotation of your phone creating this attractive and fun application. Test your skills and concentration power with this addictive free game! Hours and hours of fun with over 100 levels will make Ball Flow your favourite game for Android! Take your blue ball over each level catching green prizes and dodging red balls at the same time. Each level will get harder, requiring you to capture more prizes and lasts more time! Ball Flow is a free game made for everyone from kids to adults, so it includes three difficulty modes for everyone to have fun at their own skills levels. Once you get used to one difficulty mode, you can switch to a harder one and keep playing hours and hours. Get yourself at the top of the rankings for each level or the whole game capturing the best prizes and playing all levels and difficulties. Try to get medals on each level, capturing more prizes than level requires. Ball Flow is specially designed to work properly in phones and tablets... and it's free! ----------------------------------- FEATURES ● 100 challenging and entertaining levels. (50 free levels) ● 3 difficulty levels (Easy, Normal, Hard) ● Levels and overall game ranking. ● Bronze, Silver and Gold medal rewards on each level. ● 3 different types of prizes to catch, giving you different points amounts. ● Specially designed to look great on phones and tablets. ● Optimized to work smoothly on every device. ● It's free! HOW TO PLAY ● Use any of the two controls at the bottom corners (choose the one you feel more comfortable with). ● Move your finger across the control circle as you would do with a joystick or gamepad (like in Playstation or Xbox). ● Avoid red balls and catch green prizes as fast as possible. ----------------------------------- GET PRO VERSION OF THIS GAME FOR $ 0.99 TO ENJOY 50 EXTRA LEVELS AND REMOVE ADS FROM BALL FLOW GAME. DOWNLOAD IT HERE: http://goo.gl/49t6A1

Currency Prices Converter is extremely easy to use, and will get you all information you need in a clear, simple and precise way. description: Get the wallpapers you always wanted in the easiest way! Just write what you want to see in your wallpaper, and this live wallpaper will download online images automatically! Write anything! The name of your favourite artist, sport, city or whatever you like, and see the images appear one after another. Every image you want, in just one live wallpaper. And the best part is... this app downloads really fast, as images will be downloaded later from internet when needed (and that's very fast too!) You can also decide if you want the wallpaper to update only using Wi-Fi or with any internet connection type (Using 3G/4G connections may have a cost, but you can avoid it updating with Wi-Fi only). You can setup how fast images will update, add great decoration effects, choose different size options and much more! Smart image fitting technology will make all images look great in any screen size! Try it! If you love this wallpaper as we do, you can download PRO version, including even more features. Images are downloaded from public websites directly to your device as needed, but images may have copyright, please check for licenses before using them.

Take aim at the boxes and shoot! You will be packing balls in color boxes across 100 challenging levels and become a professional packer! Aim for the boxes and shoot the balls through elevators, walls, revolving doors, conveyor belts and much more! Use machines wisely to open your way to the right boxes and pack them all! Pack all the balls fast before you run out of time, but beware... don't miss too much or you will run out of balls too! Pack the Ball is much more than just an aiming and shooting game. This game requires some logic and it may take a lot of thinking to make it through very brain-challenging levels! (Don't worry! There are three difficulty levels anyway!) Be a good packer and try to get three golden stars at each level. Compete with your Facebook friends and see who is the best packer! Enjoy hours and hours with this addcitive free shooting game! More levels and machines coming on each update! FEATURES ● 100 challenging and entertaining levels and growing. ● 3 difficulty levels (Easy, Normal, Hard) ● Automatically detects your skills level! ● Facebook Ranking, also invite your friends to play Pack the Ball with you. ● Levels and overall game ranking. ● 3 golden stars rewards on each level. ● Lots of machines to play with! (Elevators, Fans, Switches, Revolving Doors, Seesaws, Conveyor Belts) ● Gravity changes! (No gravity, or weird gravity levels) ● Bouncing boxes and nuclear bombs. ● Realistic physics engine. ● Specially designed to look great on phones and tablets. ● Optimized to work smoothly on every device. ● Graphics options available to increase performance. ● Avaiable in English and Spanish. ● Just 4mb! Fast downloads! Little space used! ● It's free! HOW TO PLAY ● Hold down your finger in the bottom left corner of the screen and move it to aim. ● Move your finger farther from the cannon to shoot faster. ● Release your finger to shoot. ● Pack those colored balls in the boxes with the same color!

description: Teddy Bear Machine is an exciting and addictive game based on the classic Claw Machines we all have played with! Have fun with 110 challenging levels, racing against time to collect the toys with your claw. Levels get harder and harder, having more toys to collect but also some other stuff bothering to make it more complicated. But don't worry, you can choose between four difficulty levels to adjust the game to your skills. You will start collecting the funny teddy bear, but soon you will be collecting Tennis balls, Volley balls, Soccer balls, Basket balls, and even the classic Rubik Magic Cubes. But it won't be easy, some long firefighter trucks can block some of those toys and you will have to fight to get them. If you are running out of time you can also collect a clock to get some valuable extra seconds. Play each level faster and faster until you get all three medals, and climb positions in the level and the global rankings. This game will give you hours and hours of fun on your phone or your tablet! Teddy Bear Machine uses realistic physics laws to simulate claw and toys movements, giving you an immersive game experience where you feel like playing in the real world machine. Enjoy playing with this great Teddy Picker! Being one of the most lightweight games for Android, you won't have to worry about your phone available memory. Just download and have lots of fun! FEATURES • 110 challenging and entertaining levels. (70 free levels) • 4 difficulty levels (Easy, Normal, Hard, Very Hard) • Levels and overall game ranking. • Bronze, Silver and Gold medal rewards on each level. • 8 different toys to collect. • Bonus time clocks. • Play on 6 different locations going from a recreation center to a luxurious casino. • Realistic physics engine. • Specially designed to look great on phones and tablets. • Optimized to work smoothly on every device. • Graphics options available to increase performance. HOW TO PLAY • Hold down your finger to make the claw move towards your finger's position. • Tap the screen to open or close the claw. • Take the toys above the dashed line to collect them. TEDDY BEAR MACHINE PRO Get "Teddy Bear Machine Pro" to play 40 extra levels and remove all advertisements: http://goo.gl/3qBY3

This free application handles hundreds of animated emoticons (gif). This is the main application , the emoticons are contained in separate packages in the store and available for download . The main screen displays the list of installed packages ( empty at first installation ) and the list of available packages (no need to look for them just click the name , and the store will be open for download) you can share and use the emoticons in various ways. Press the question mark button in the main screen to see some examples . you can add emoticons to a list of favorites ( which you can sort by date or package ) for quick access . the application stores the last 100 emoticons shared in chronological order The application takes up very little memory space, you can install all the packages you want and keep only the ones you like! Additional packages will be made ​​available over time.

This application contains many of the works of Leonardo da Vinci carefully cataloged. The main screen provides a quick view of the categories accompanied by an explanatory image and title (if the title is not entirely visible you can touch the image of the category to make it slide). Long touch the image of the category to diplay the gallery with all the thumbnails. Touching a thumbnail will open the enlarged work and you can navigate in current section using the gallery below. You can perform various actions on the work currently displayed using the buttons at the bottom. Using the buttons: 1. Back arrow: Back to previous view 2. Four arrows: Displays the current work in full screen (you can choose the external program of your choice. Example Gallery) 4. Phone Icon: Set as Background currently displayed work (will be displayed a dialog box for confirm) Thanks

description: "TRAK is a great Brain Training Game." by Dr. Nakamura In fact TRAK is extremely addictive and the best puzzle game you've ever seen. It’s a modern combination of a puzzle, memory and brain trainig game. A perfect Brain Fitness Game for everybody between the age of 3 and 70 to focus and boost up your concentration. What is Brain Fitness? Brain fitness is the capacity of a person to meet the various cognitive demands of life. It is evident in an ability to assimilate information, comprehend relationships, and develop reasonable conclusions and plans. Brain fitness can be developed by formal education, being actively mentally engaged in life, continuing to learn, and exercises designed to challenge cognitive skills. Healthy lifestyle habits including mental stimulation, physical exercise, good nutrition, stress management, and sleep can improve brain fitness. On the other hand, chronic stress, anxiety, depression, aging, air pollution, decreasing estrogen, excess oxytocin, and prolonged cortisol can decrease brain fitness as well as general health. TRAK was and is developed to help you increasing your concentration and brain memory by a simple puzzle game. It's simple to learn, easy to play, but surprisingly difficult to be the best! Don’t believe it? Try it! [H] – HOW TO PLAY • In every level different amount of tiles get coloured • Concentrate & Memorise the coloured tiles • Track the tiles [F] – FEATURES • Simple Gameplay Mode • Unlimited levels for endless fun • Great Gameplay Sounds • Ranking of worldwide Players (play with your friends!) [C] – CONTACT FB – facebook.com/traktiles TW – twitter.com/traktiles or contact us by trak@citrusmedia.at Do you enjoy TRAK? Then please rate it, share it and play it.

description: Meteorites destroyed the worlds power supply lines. Help to built up new connections. The game starts at Europe. Your goal is to connect Start- and Endblock in more than 100 levels. Therefor you have to use the abilities of 14 different blocks. The more levels you solve, the more blocks you unlock. Each block makes the game a bit more difficult. After the first 18 levels Europe is shining again, so you can continue with North America. The game is done when all continents have their light back. GAME FEATURES * Completely free to play * More than 100 levels * 14 different blocks * Original soundtrack * Full Tablet support ——————————————– Light Factory was created by Florian Leimgruber and Florian Weiermann. We’re two 16 year old boys from Austria. nextstop Rhein-Neckar, public transport schedule Mannheim, Ludwigshafen und Heidelberg, RNV, Öffis, Transit Nextstop provides an information service in real time for all public transport lines of Mannheim, Ludwigshafen, Heidelberg City. The current timetable and information of departure times of all stations are at your hands in no time. Additionally, to allow a better orientation, stations can be displayed on a road map. For route calculation, the departure and destination points can be either stations or positions on the road map. Nextstop shows you your route, from door to door including all footpaths. With nextstop you get important information for your travel all the time and always up to date. Where and when with nextstop Start nextstop and see immediately the departures of surrounding stations! Have a good trip wishes you nextstop.at Abstract (features): * Automatically shows all public transit routes near you * Find departure times from stations * Find stations and get directions * Multimodal trip planner from Door to door * Display stations in road map * Route including footpaths and taxi * Uses real-time predictions * Text message ticket generator (Single / day ticket) * Network plan - including Nightliner * Disorders, Maintenance & News Found an error? Zeigt die Spritpreisdaten der Energie-Control Austria ( http://www.spritpreisrechner.at ) übersichtlich für dein Smartphone an. Rechtliches: Das Preistransparenzgesetz, BGBl. I Nr. 54/2011, sowie die Preistransparenzverordnung, BGBl. II Nr. 246/2011, die am 2. August in Kraft getreten ist, verpflichtet alle Tankstellenbetreiber in Österreich, Preisänderungen bei Superbenzin 95 und Dieselkraftstoff zu melden. Für die Richtigkeit und Vollständigkeit der Daten wird keine Haftung übernommen. Wichtiger Hinweis: Enthält nur Daten für Österreich! No liability is assumed for the accuracy and completeness of the data. Important Note: Only includes data for Austria! Somewhere in the universe, eavesdropping a dialog between Captain Picard and his crew… "Captain, this is fascinating! This new tool knows the names of the mountains I am looking at." Experience the intriguing panorama of the peaks surrounding you. Have you ever wondered "What is the name of that prominent peak over there?” – find the answer simply by taking a look through the camera of your iPhone or Android device. The advanced segmentation and display algorithms show you all peak names without obstructing the marvelous panorama. Stagger even the greatest hiking buffs when showing off the fascinating panoramic view this application provides when standing on top of a mountain! This app works on devices with a still camera and a magnetometer/accelerometer.
release_text: - reduced "flickering" of peaks - improved text-size (rendering) - fixed a bug where some peaks would vanish - a number of smaller bugfixes

description: Park.ME – the intelligent smartphone-solution informs you always and everywhere about Short-term-parking – parking zone – parking areas – tariffs – actual fees – park-tickets … Short-term parking zone? Yes/No? No ticket, no small change but many questions? park.ME takes care of it! park.ME by TRAFFICPASS allows uncomplicated and carefree parking in 12 Austrian and 8 German cities. Whenever and wherever you want to park – park.ME autonomously recognises: • your geographical position • short-term parking zones with more informations like: o tariff o max. parking-duration o reminder your parking ticket is expiring More park.ME features: • Integrated Carfinder, included • license plate selection and management • Quickstart function Looking for traffic signs, parking machines, or selling points for prepaid parking vouchers are history! Register now via www.trafficpass.com and use all the advantages of our app and services in: BAD HALL (starting August 2015) – BAD HOMBURG – BAD OLDESLOE – BADEN BEI WIEN – BERLIN – BINGEN – BLUDENZ – GRAZ – HANAU – INNSBRUCK – KLOSTERNEUBURG – KÖLN – KREMS AN DER DONAU – LINZ – MAINZ – SALZBURG – ST. JOHANN in TIROL – WIEN – WIESBADEN - Parkplatz der WKO Steiermark – ZELL am SEE. HOW? Only by 3 steps: 1 - Park your vehicle 2 - Start the park.ME app 3 - Press the START button To stop your parking action: simply press the STOP button! (Note: to use park.ME data connection and activated GPS needed!) YOUR BENEFITS? • up-to-date informations (short-term parking zones, tariffs, max. parking duration, etc.) • no charge for sms • no pre-payment required • easy to use • service available in 19 cities (Austria and Germany) • 1 user account for your family / your company and for all your cell phones and vehicles • transparent overview of all parking transactions and invoices • split invoices, if needed • group invoices by cost units • special conditions for business clients Users of traditional mobile phones can also use our SMS parking Service. Parkticket runs out? No problem – park.ME always reminds you on time! For all our customers we offer a free service line! For more information visit our homepage (www.trafficpass.com) or contact our service-hotline free of charge: +43 699 15939316 from Austria, +49 234 52009855 from Germany Forget old-fashioned tickets and machines! Welcome to the future, join park.ME! Try our other services as well: toll.ME - the comfortable service to pay for special toll roads in Austria More information on www.trafficpass.com

description: In response to user feedback, the updated MotorMouth App now has site level pricing data to help you decide where to buy based on your current location. With all the great features you have come to know that enable you to determine the right time to buy and maximise your saving in the price cycle, you can now see, at a glance, the prices (where available) for your default fuel type at your nearest service stations on the ‘Pricing Map’, helping you to make an informed choice on where to buy. MotorMouth collects site level data via four methods: - Electronically, twice a day from Informed Sources - Manually, collected by our drivers - (For Perth) Sourced from government WA FuelWatch - Direct from service station site operators, who can input their prices using our online service www.mypriceboard.com CAUTION: While no site prices on the Pricing Map (shown at the time of screen refresh) will be older than 24 hours, make sure you check how old a price is by viewing the Priceboard screen. Each price has the time/date of its capture clearly displayed. MotorMouth also obtains aggregate data from Informed Sources every 15 minutes to enable you to make your fuel purchase decisions based on the most comprehensive pricing data available across Australia. Understand the current position of the price cycle for your city with our rolling 31-Day Price Cycle Chart. Work out when you should next fill-up with our exclusive 7-Day Price Outlook. Identify the price you should Buy Below at any given time within any area regardless of whether or not site level pricing data is available. Remember, if you fill up at an expensive station, it might cost you an extra 2 cents per litre, but if you fill up on the wrong day it could cost you 15 cents per litre. It’s not where to buy that is key – but WHEN! NOTE: All pricing information screens are limited to a set number of searches each week. These are reset every Sunday evening. This has been included as a precautionary measure to try and avoid our data being misused. You will see the ‘Remaining Checks’ available at the bottom of these screens. On top of all this, in the ‘Find a Site’ section MotorMouth also enables you to locate service stations not only based on their address but also the brand, available fuels and/or facilities. It can even tell you how to get there. Interactive mapping is provided so all the common gestures apply including drag and drop for street view imagery. Simple and easy to use supporting intuitive gestures and at a glance insight through charts and green, amber, red man indicators to show the current price climate and outlook for the coming week. This nationwide app supports all major fuel types available in Australia: • ULP – Unleaded Petrol 91 RON • E10 – Unleaded Petrol with up to 10% Ethanol • PULP95 – Premium Unleaded Petrol 95 RON • PULP98 – Premium Unleaded Petrol 98 RON • LPG – Liquefied Petroleum Gas • DSL – Diesel • Premium Diesel FEATURES LIST: Insights & Information: • Location based data to show the closest service stations and their prices (where available) • Simple Green Man, Amber Man, Red Man concept to help you decide when or how much to buy (top-up -vs.- fill up) • Area specific fuel price information to let you know what is a reasonable price to pay • Click-through functionality from brand icons on maps to provide the address, phone number, site photo, available fuels, and facilities at each site Search (‘Find a Site’ section): • Use your device GPS (if available) or enter the suburb or postcode • Fast Search auto completion and location information for majority of suburbs & postcodes • Filter site map by Brands, Fuel Types and Facilities User Input & Feedback: • Provide feedback in-app to allow us to make changes where necessary

The South Australian Carpool is a free, online service for anyone who wants to save money, meet new people and reduce their carbon footprint while travelling to work or study. It takes two minutes to join the network and then the software will search its database and match you with other people travelling in the same direction

description: You can now try WikiCamps for free for the first 14 days then upgrade to the full version. WikiCamps is a dynamic user generated camping app for Australia. What does this mean? It means all the sites are added, edited and shared by users like yourself! Wikicamps also works offline with the ability to download all site and user content, as well as a high quality offline map. The database is constantly growing and always being updated with the latest information about sites from all over Australia. With over 19,500 listings already, join the largest and fastest growing camping app in Australia. Listings including Caravan Parks, Camp Sites, Backpacker Hostels, Day Stops, Points of Interest and Information Centres. Each site has loads of information to help you plan your get away from activities including swimming, fishing, 4x4ing, pet rules, Wi-Fi hotspots, pricing, toilets, showers and heaps more. You can use Wiki Camps to add and view photos from other happy campers all around Australia. So you can see what the camp site is like before you go there. Rate sites as you go and add them to your own personal favourites list. With heaps of extra gadgets including: * Satellite dish pointer * Camping Checklist * Home Clock * Chat Forum * Compass * High Quality Offline Map
release_text: * Fixed trial period popup message appearing when it shouldn't

description: Calculate your postage, create your label, pay and lodge your parcels on the go, anytime, with our free Parcel Send App. We can also come to your nominated address to pick your parcels up. It’s that convenient! - Register your user details to allow greater access to time saving functions or simply sign in as a guest - Drop off at your local Australia Post Retail outlet or order a pickup for added convenience - Select a flexible payment option that suits you - credit card, PayPal or your Australia Post Business Credit Account - Track your parcels - Save your frequently used parcel sizes so you don’t have to enter the dimensions every time
release_text: Refreshed the design, simplified the steps for sending a parcel and enhanced the summary screen – including the introduction of a new edit function.

description: CPA Congress brings together over 10,000 finance, accounting and business professionals in a global conversation that will help convert innovative ideas into practical action plans. CPA Congress is delivered globally in 13 locations including Melbourne, Sydney, Canberra, Brisbane, Hobart, Adelaide, Darwin, Perth, Auckland, Singapore, Malaysia, Hong Kong and London. Our CPA Congress app will provide all the information you’ll need while attending this year. Use our app to: • View the program information • Explore session content • Access speaker information • View the venue map • Connect with exhibitors and sponsors • Keep up to date with live news • Provide survey feedback and participate in live polls
